['', " Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology or Computer Science or equivalent professional experience; MBA or other graduate specialization in Finance and/or Accounting preferred", ' Strong SQL ability; able to write complex SQL queries against data warehouse/databases for the purposes of extracting required data and building data models for automated reporting and insights use case. Able to parse different types of data (JSON, parquet, excel/csv) for analysis using tools like R or Python. Able to quickly visualize and profile data in tools like Tableau, PowerPivot, etc.', 'Qualifications', ' Provide front-line support for data visualizations, dashboards and reports, answering user questions and resolving issues. Work with the Analytics Technology team to address back-end data or platform issues affecting reports.', ' Able to parse different types of data (JSON, parquet, excel/csv) for analysis using tools like R or Python.', ' Experience with a variety of reporting and data visualization tools; Tableau, Business Objects, and PowerPivot preferred. Proven track record building and automating reports, data visualizations and dashboards in a business context for a variety of stakeholders, from leadership oriented summary dashboards to more granular and detailed analyses.', ' Strong communication skills; Ability to engage with stakeholders on key business questions and hypotheses and tell compelling stories with data through visualization and reporting tools.', ' Strong SQL ability; able to write complex SQL queries against data warehouse/databases for the purposes of extracting required data and building data models for automated reporting and insights use case.', ' Solid SQL skills; ability to query data in a data warehouse and prepare data for reporting and insights automation needs. Experience with using Python/Pandas for data preparation/cleansing and analysis ideal but not required.', ' Experience working in a business setting; Experience working in a Corporate Finance and/or Controlling context and familiarity with key Finance terms, KPIs and typical reports strongly preferred.', ' Partner with the Converse Analytics Technology team to define data requirements and source data, either in terms of raw data or modeled data and logic to support insights, dashboard and report requirements.', ' Able to quickly visualize and profile data in tools like Tableau, PowerPivot, etc.', ' Automation mindset; Identify opportunities to automate insights generation work and ability to partner with Technology teams to implement solutions where possible.', ' Review, assess and automate the existing set of reports that are being run across Global Finance; Reports are run across a variety of tools, such as Business Objects, Excel and Tableau.', ' Partner with stakeholders in Global Finance to identify key reports, business questions, hypotheses, and areas of exploration that will have a material impact on business decision-making, and translate these areas into requirements for insights, reports and data visualizations.', ' Interact with many types of data in both SQL and non-SQL based environments.', ' Strong business analysis capabilities; Ability to ask go beyond reporting and ask “why”; Strong drive to drill into data and uncover root causes. Strong ability to “tell stories” with data to business stakeholders, particularly stakeholders within our Finance and Controlling organizations. Work as part of an agile team, delivering reports and insights in an iterative manner with a “progress over perfection” mindset.', ' Work as part of an agile team, delivering reports and insights in an iterative manner with a “progress over perfection” mindset.', ' Interact with many types of data in both SQL and non-SQL based environments. Parse data in common formats such as JSON, Parquet, excel/csv so that it can be usable for insights and analysis. Partner with the Converse Analytics Technology team to define data requirements and source data, either in terms of raw data or modeled data and logic to support insights, dashboard and report requirements.', ' Experience working in an agile setting, working with developers to release in an iterative fashion.', ' Partner with stakeholders in Global Finance to identify key reports, business questions, hypotheses, and areas of exploration that will have a material impact on business decision-making, and translate these areas into requirements for insights, reports and data visualizations. Review, assess and automate the existing set of reports that are being run across Global Finance; Reports are run across a variety of tools, such as Business Objects, Excel and Tableau. Provide front-line support for data visualizations, dashboards and reports, answering user questions and resolving issues. Work with the Analytics Technology team to address back-end data or platform issues affecting reports.', ' Parse data in common formats such as JSON, Parquet, excel/csv so that it can be usable for insights and analysis.', ' Strong ability to “tell stories” with data to business stakeholders, particularly stakeholders within our Finance and Controlling organizations.', " Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology or Computer Science or equivalent professional experience; MBA or other graduate specialization in Finance and/or Accounting preferred Solid SQL skills; ability to query data in a data warehouse and prepare data for reporting and insights automation needs. Experience with using Python/Pandas for data preparation/cleansing and analysis ideal but not required. Experience with a variety of reporting and data visualization tools; Tableau, Business Objects, and PowerPivot preferred. Proven track record building and automating reports, data visualizations and dashboards in a business context for a variety of stakeholders, from leadership oriented summary dashboards to more granular and detailed analyses. Strong communication skills; Ability to engage with stakeholders on key business questions and hypotheses and tell compelling stories with data through visualization and reporting tools. Automation mindset; Identify opportunities to automate insights generation work and ability to partner with Technology teams to implement solutions where possible. Experience working in an agile setting, working with developers to release in an iterative fashion. Experience working in a business setting; Experience working in a Corporate Finance and/or Controlling context and familiarity with key Finance terms, KPIs and typical reports strongly preferred.", ' Strong business analysis capabilities; Ability to ask go beyond reporting and ask “why”; Strong drive to drill into data and uncover root causes.']

['', 'Experience orchestrating data infrastructure (Spark, S3, Kafka/Kinesis, Redshift).', 'Manage vendor interactions related to our data stack', 'Tool our data systems for observability, including logging, metrics monitoring, and dashboarding', 'Birchbox was founded in 2010 to redefine the way consumers discover and shop for beauty and grooming. The company quickly grew from an exciting idea to a business that has materially shaped the beauty industry: we’ve activated an enormous group of underserved, untapped consumers, awakening their relationship with beauty and grooming by making the experience relevant, easy and fun. Our innovation isn’t the simple concept of delivering a box of samples — it’s understanding that although not everyone is passionate about beauty and grooming, everyone still deserves to have a great experience finding, trying and buying it.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Design and build components of internal tooling used by our subscription operations team (Python)', 'Contribute to an open, empowering, responsible, and proactive engineering culture.', 'Birchbox is seeking an ambitious and experienced Data Engineer to help evolve our data systems. In addition to fueling our BI platform, recommender systems, and email marketing, our data services inform decision-making company-wide.This role will be very impactful as we build out the next generation of our data services, and will have considerable leeway in driving future strategy and architecture.', 'Build and maintain fault-tolerant, scalable batch data pipelinesArchitect and maintain soft real time event analytics pipelinesDesign and implement cloud-based data and machine learning pipelines (Databricks, s3 data lake)Implement fault tolerant data integrations between internal systems and with third-party APIs, supporting product and marketing needsCreate and integrate internal A/B testing tooling for engineering and product teamsWork with the Business Intelligence team, advising on data provenance and reliability and integrating data sources for analysts.Manage vendor interactions related to our data stackDesign and build components of internal tooling used by our subscription operations team (Python)Tool our data systems for observability, including logging, metrics monitoring, and dashboardingTrain and upskill future data engineersContribute to an open, empowering, responsible, and proactive engineering culture.', 'Work with the Business Intelligence team, advising on data provenance and reliability and integrating data sources for analysts.', 'Familiarity with non-relational data stores and/or indexes (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB, ElasticSearch).', 'Requirements:', 'Our Stack: Fivetran/dbt/Redshift/Metabase. Airflow (astronomer.io), Databricks. Python and a little bit of Scala.', 'Architect and maintain soft real time event analytics pipelines', '**This role is located in New York, NY and will be remote until 2021 due to COVID.**', 'Position Overview', 'Requirements', 'Create and integrate internal A/B testing tooling for engineering and product teams', 'Train and upskill future data engineers', 'Degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience).', 'Expert in Python, and comfortable with at least two other languages (e.g., Java, Ruby, PHP).', 'Build and maintain fault-tolerant, scalable batch data pipelines', "You'll be joining a lean Agile team supporting Data Infrastructure and Machine Learning. Primary upcoming initiatives include retooling our event data collection systems, supporting the next generation of our A/B testing machinery, and iterating on our data pipelines. Each of these projects will primarily involve data extraction, transformation, and loading, as well as DevOps work and vendor management. You will train junior developers and work with the technical leadership of the company to drive best practices for data.", 'Implement fault tolerant data integrations between internal systems and with third-party APIs, supporting product and marketing needs', 'About Birchbox', 'Advanced SQL skills (MySQL and/or Postgres), familiarity with data warehousing.', 'Experience working on teams using distributed version control (e.g., Git, Mercurial).', 'Design and implement cloud-based data and machine learning pipelines (Databricks, s3 data lake)', 'Strong command line skills for working within virtualized machines (bash, tmux / screen, vim / emacs).', 'Birchbox welcomes people from all backgrounds, ethnicities, cultures, and experiences. We celebrate how different perspectives benefit our employees, our products, and our community. We are focused on cultivating a diverse and inclusive work environment that encourages collaboration, creativity, and innovation. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer.', '3+ years of professional software experience (or equivalent).', 'Experience with modern workflow management systems (e.g., Airflow, Luigi).', '\ufeff', '3+ years of professional software experience (or equivalent).Degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience).Expert in Python, and comfortable with at least two other languages (e.g., Java, Ruby, PHP).Strong command line skills for working within virtualized machines (bash, tmux / screen, vim / emacs).Experience orchestrating data infrastructure (Spark, S3, Kafka/Kinesis, Redshift).Experience with modern workflow management systems (e.g., Airflow, Luigi).Advanced SQL skills (MySQL and/or Postgres), familiarity with data warehousing.Familiarity with non-relational data stores and/or indexes (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB, ElasticSearch).Experience working on teams using distributed version control (e.g., Git, Mercurial).']

['', '• Explore relevant technology stacks to find the best fit for each dataset', 'The Data Engineer collects terabytes of data across all aspects of its operations, from genome sequencing, crop field trials, manufacturing, supply chain, financial transactions and everything in between. There is an enormous need and potential here to do something that has never been done before. We need great people to help transform these complex scientific datasets into innovative software that is deployed across the pipeline, accelerating the pace and quality of all crop system development decisions to unbelievable levels.', 'SKILLS', '• Take pride in software craftsmanship, apply a deep knowledge of algorithms and data structures to continuously improve and innovate', 'We are looking for a Sr. Level Data Engineer', '• A level of comfort with Unit Testing and Test Driven Development methodologies', '• Familiarity with creating and maintaining containerized application deployments with a platform like Docker', '• Pursue opportunities to present our work at relevant technical conferences', 'What you will do is why you should join us:', 'Please send resumes directly to judy@syllogisteks.com', 'No 3rd party agencies please.\xa0Will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States. This is not a position for which sponsorship will be provided. Individuals with temporary visas such as E, F-1, H-1, H-2, L, B, J, or TN or who need sponsorship for work authorization\xa0now or in the future, are not eligible for hire.', '• Work with other top-level talent solving a wide range of complex and unique challenges that have real world impact', '\xa0', '• Experience with stream processing using Apache Kafka', '• Experience data modeling for large scale databases, either relational or NoSQL', '• Proven experience (2 years) building and maintaining data-intensive APIs using a RESTful approach', '• Be a critical senior member of a data engineering team focused on creating distributed analysis capabilities around a large variety of datasets', '• A proven ability to build and maintain cloud based infrastructure on a major cloud provider like AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform', '\xa0At least 2 years experience with Go']

This includes knowledge of the roles and responsibilities of software engineering and other functions, major phases, checkpoints and deliverables. This also includes the ability to identify common issues and considerations for bringing a new product to the marketplace. Technical Troubleshooting - Knowledge of systematic approaches to solving common technical problems (e.g., hardware, software, application, operational). This includes the ability to identify problems and report and escalate problems according to established procedures. This also includes the ability to identify available resources for troubleshooting. Time Management - The ability to quickly prioritize mission-critical from less important or trivial work activities. This includes sensing what the next most useful thing is to work on, and focusing on the critical few tasks that add value while putting aside or delaying the rest.', ' Resolves straightforward software issues and bugs within a reasonable amount of time.', ' Frequently transports and installs equipment up to 5 lbs.', 'Applicants', 'Preferred Qualifications']

['', "The candidate will be involved in all aspects of engineers' productivity improvements, including ideation, design, implementation, deployment, and promotion of productivity-enhancing solutions. We remain open to diverse career paths.", 'An ideal candidate should deeply care about productivity and automation, be fluent in one or two programming languages, have full-stack experience, and be eager to learn as needed. job_title: Senior Software Engineer- Big Data Technologies
job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. ['', 'About VaST: Founded in 1999, VaST is headquartered in Warrenton, Virginia. VaST is 100% employee owned through our Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) with employees supporting clients around the globe. Our highest priorities are providing top-tier support to our clients while maintaining an employee first culture. Through this, VaST has earned the highest reputation of quality support as we are continually relied upon to solve the most difficult engineering problems for our clients. Our employees enjoy some of the most flexible and valuable compensation packages in the industry along with the long-term investment that comes from company ownership. Through our ESOP program, employees are provided ownership through annual contributions made by the employer. At VaST, being an employee owner means having a stable present while building your future.', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Position Description: We are seeking software engineers that possess a mix of talent areas related to full-stack development. As part of our team, you’ll provide software and web development services from our office in Warrention / Gainesville, VA area. Our ideal candidate would possess a broad range of skills as our scope of work spans various technologies. A couple of the current technologies we are using to support our customers are Java, Python, Javascript, Angular, React and ElasticSearch. VaST encourages independent problem solving but also provide deep reach back support and a collaborative environment for our engineering team. We want motivated people who have experience with developing and are not afraid to adapt to the right architecture, languages, and libraries to build the best systems for the mission and deliver the best user experience.\xa0\xa0', 'Self-motivated and eager to work intently to satisfy mission requirements', 'For more information about VaST, visit our website at www.VaST-inc.com.', 'Eligibility for TS/SCI clearance with Polygraph (U.S. citizenship required)Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related fieldSelf-motivated and eager to work intently to satisfy mission requirementsAdaptable and desire to maintain our VaST cultureTwo (2) or more years with some combination of the following: Java, Javascript/Typescript, Python, Angular. ELK stack, Redis, Web Services (REST), Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Android development, NoSQL and SQL databases, Xmidas, Digital Signal Processing', 'Position Summary:', 'www.VaST-inc.com', 'Eligibility for TS/SCI clearance with Polygraph (U.S. citizenship required)', 'Adaptable and desire to maintain our VaST culture', '\xa0', 'Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field', 'Two (2) or more years with some combination of the following: Java, Javascript/Typescript, Python, Angular. ELK stack, Redis, Web Services (REST), Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Android development, NoSQL and SQL databases, Xmidas, Digital Signal Processing', 'Position Description: ', 'Position Summary: VaST is seeking qualified candidates to fill our Software Engineer positions that include full stack development.', 'About VaST: ', 'Virginia Systems & Technology Inc. is proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class', 'For more information about VaST']

['', '• Explore relevant technology stacks to find the best fit for each dataset', 'The Data Engineer collects terabytes of data across all aspects of its operations, from genome sequencing, crop field trials, manufacturing, supply chain, financial transactions and everything in between. There is an enormous need and potential here to do something that has never been done before. We need great people to help transform these complex scientific datasets into innovative software that is deployed across the pipeline, accelerating the pace and quality of all crop system development decisions to unbelievable levels.', 'SKILLS', '• Take pride in software craftsmanship, apply a deep knowledge of algorithms and data structures to continuously improve and innovate', 'We are looking for a Sr. Level Data Engineer', '• A level of comfort with Unit Testing and Test Driven Development methodologies', '• Familiarity with creating and maintaining containerized application deployments with a platform like Docker', '• Pursue opportunities to present our work at relevant technical conferences', 'What you will do is why you should join us:', 'Please send resumes directly to judy@syllogisteks.com', 'No 3rd party agencies please.\xa0Will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States. This is not a position for which sponsorship will be provided. Individuals with temporary visas such as E, F-1, H-1, H-2, L, B, J, or TN or who need sponsorship for work authorization\xa0now or in the future, are not eligible for hire.', '• Work with other top-level talent solving a wide range of complex and unique challenges that have real world impact', '\xa0', '• Experience with stream processing using Apache Kafka', '• Experience data modeling for large scale databases, either relational or NoSQL', '• Proven experience (2 years) building and maintaining data-intensive APIs using a RESTful approach', '• Be a critical senior member of a data engineering team focused on creating distributed analysis capabilities around a large variety of datasets', '• A proven ability to build and maintain cloud based infrastructure on a major cloud provider like AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform', '\xa0At least 2 years experience with Go']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Critical thinker.', 'Virtusa was founded on principles of equal opportunity for all, and so does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.', 'Responsibilities', 'Teamwork, quality of life, professional and personal development: values that Virtusa is proud to embody. ['', 'Do you want to build a career that is truly worthwhile? Working at the World Bank Group provides a unique opportunity for you to help our clients solve their greatest development challenges. The World Bank Group is one of the largest sources of funding and knowledge for developing countries; a unique global partnership of five institutions dedicated to ending extreme poverty, increasing shared prosperity and promoting sustainable development. With 189 member countries and more than 120 offices worldwide, we work with public and private sector partners, investing in groundbreaking projects and using data, research, and technology to develop solutions to the most urgent global challenges. For more information, visit www.worldbank.org', 'ITS services range from establishing the infrastructure to reach and connect staff and development stakeholders; providing the devices and agile technology and information applications to facilitate the science of delivery through decentralized services; creating and maintaining tools to integrate information across the World Bank Group, the clients we serve and the countries where we operate; and delivering the computing power staff need to analyze development challenges and identify solutions.', 'Identify opportunities for innovation.\xa0', 'The ITS Enterprise Services unit, provides a wide range of technical services: data centers, system administration, database, middleware, cloud, enterprise monitoring and identity and access management. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience developing code in AT LEAST ONE high-level programing language and in automation/testing via scripting/programing (e.g. Python, Ruby, Java, PowerShell).', 'Introduction to the World Bank Group', 'Troubleshoot technical issues. ', 'Master’s degree with 2 years experience or Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of 4 years experience in Computer Engineering or relevant area.Experience with Unix/Linux.Experience with opensource tools in a production environment.Experience with AT LEAST ONE log aggregation tool (e.g. Splunk, Elastic)Experience in AWS/Azure.Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills, including the ability to define problems and analyze the root cause.Self-starter with a track record in learning new technologies.Experience developing code in AT LEAST ONE high-level programing language and in automation/testing via scripting/programing (e.g. Python, Ruby, Java, PowerShell).Excellent interpersonal, problem-solving, communication and team skills, and ability to think innovatively.', 'The DevOps Engineer position is within ITSIA team which builds and operates a large, hybrid IT infrastructure, with thousands of servers, hundreds of databases and petabytes of data, spanning colocation sites, AWS and Azure Clouds. It utilizes modern, infrastructure as code tools like Chef, Terraform, Azure DevOps and Splunk.', 'Experience with opensource tools in a production environment.', 'We provide a meaningful, open, and collaborative environment. We have many interesting and challenging problems to solve, providing you an opportunity to develop your skills while contributing to the mission of the World Bank. We value teamwork, openness, curiosity, and persistence. We will ensure that you will receive training and knowledge sharing across the team.', 'Selection Criteria', 'Excellent interpersonal, problem-solving, communication and team skills, and ability to think innovatively.', 'Experience in AWS/Azure.', 'Work as part of a team to engineer, implement and operate scalable, highly available systems on-premises and in the Cloud.Write code for automation and integration of diverse systemsTroubleshoot technical issues. Identify opportunities for innovation.\xa0', 'Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills, including the ability to define problems and analyze the root cause.', 'Work as part of a team to engineer, implement and operate scalable, highly available systems on-premises and in the Cloud.', 'Master’s degree with 2 years experience or Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of 4 years experience in Computer Engineering or relevant area.', 'Experience with Unix/Linux.', 'Experience with AT LEAST ONE log aggregation tool (e.g. Splunk, Elastic)', 'Information and Technology Solutions (ITS) enables the WBG to achieve its mission by delivering transformative information and technologies to its staff working in over 130 client countries.', 'Write code for automation and integration of diverse systems', 'Self-starter with a track record in learning new technologies.', 'ITSIA is growing its DevOps and Automation capabilities to act as a Center of Excellence for the World Bank Group. You will be working in an innovative, creative and agile environment to develop new products and automate existing ones (infrastructure, processes and systems). Additionally, you will help us to improve our customer experience.']

['', 'Automate and handle the lifecycle of data sets (schema evolution, metadata store, change and backfill management, deprecation and migration).', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Provide visibility into our data flows (comprehensive view of sources, transformations, sinks, data lineage).', 'Expertise in object-oriented and/or functional programming languages (e.g. Python, Java/Scala).', 'Skilled at crafting and building robust backend data services (distributed systems, concurrency models, microservices).', 'Excellent written and verbal communication and social skills; able to effectively collaborate with partners.', 'What You Will Be Doing', " 5+ years of experience working with Big Data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, etc). Deep understanding of polyglot data persistence (relational, key/value, document, column, graph). Skilled at crafting and building robust backend data services (distributed systems, concurrency models, microservices). Strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows. Expertise in object-oriented and/or functional programming languages (e.g. Python, Java/Scala). Excellent written and verbal communication and social skills; able to effectively collaborate with partners. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience. ", 'Supply reusable backend abstractions to ingest or access data sets (batch or low latency APIs).', ' Optimize the end-to-end workflow of data users at Slack (from crafting libraries to providing abstractions used to define jobs, schedule data pipelines or access data assets). Provide visibility into our data flows (comprehensive view of sources, transformations, sinks, data lineage). Automate and handle the lifecycle of data sets (schema evolution, metadata store, change and backfill management, deprecation and migration). Streamline the creation of new data sets with accessible frameworks and Domain Specific Languages (DSL). Improve the data quality and reliability of the pipelines (monitoring and failure detection). Supply reusable backend abstractions to ingest or access data sets (batch or low latency APIs). ', 'What You Should Have', '5+ years of experience working with Big Data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, etc).', 'Strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows.', 'Deep understanding of polyglot data persistence (relational, key/value, document, column, graph).', 'Optimize the end-to-end workflow of data users at Slack (from crafting libraries to providing abstractions used to define jobs, schedule data pipelines or access data assets).', 'Streamline the creation of new data sets with accessible frameworks and Domain Specific Languages (DSL).', 'Improve the data quality and reliability of the pipelines (monitoring and failure detection).']

['', 'Bonus', 'Interact with multiple teams.', 'Make bold decisions', 'Competitive salary and stock options.', 'Data Scientist | Acorns', 'With benevolence and courage, we look after the financial best interests of the up-and-coming; beginning with the empowering step of micro-investing.\xa0', 'Strong SQL abilities and experience with massive relational database systems.', 'Within 1 month, you will:', 'Knowledge of scalable and efficient methods for large scale data analysis and model development.', 'Lead with heartMake bold decisionsAlways build trustNever stop growingFind a way', 'Hunger for impact, drive, and creativity', 'Find a way', 'At Acorns, Data Scientists have broad latitude around data and you will collaborate with groups including Analytics, Engineering, Product Management, Marketing, Operations, Risk, and Business Development.', 'BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.', 'Background in data mining, machine learning, statistical analysis, or mathematical modeling, with experience deploying models in a production environment.', 'What you will bring to Acorns:', 'Have established architecture and implementation for an intelligence-driven product feature in a data-rich environment.', 'Values:', 'This role has the option to be remote or based in our Irvine or New York offices.', 'What we offer:', 'Always build trust', 'Discover new opportunities to apply data science concepts to the portfolio of products.', 'Requirements:', 'Partnered with Engineering teams to deliver data science solutions into the product with proper API design.', 'Competitive salary and stock options.A comprehensive benefits package to meet the needs of you and your family.Flexible paid time off.Numerous career possibilities that allow you to grow with Acorns.Talented and motivated team members who care deeply about one another, our mission and our customers.The rare opportunity to create a new world. We inspire one another every day to do meaningful work that solves big societal challenges.', 'Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:', 'Lead with heart', 'BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.3-4+ years of experience in working with noisy real-world structured and semi-structured data.Python or Scala, with related statistical and machine learning packages.Background in data mining, machine learning, statistical analysis, or mathematical modeling, with experience deploying models in a production environment.Experience with A/B testing methodologies and experiments.Hunger for impact, drive, and creativityStrong SQL abilities and experience with massive relational database systems.Able to take a complex, ambiguous topic and turn it into a defined problem that answers the business question we are trying to solve.Excellent communication skills\xa0', 'Within 3 months, you will:', 'Made production quality code commits into the team’s repository.', 'Able to take a complex, ambiguous topic and turn it into a defined problem that answers the business question we are trying to solve.', 'Talented and motivated team members who care deeply about one another, our mission and our customers.', 'About Acorns:', 'Pride in your work', 'Empathy for our customers’ financial situations and the desire to help our customers in need of personalized products and services.', 'Never stop growing', 'Collaborated with the Product Management team to plan projects and recommend areas for the next generation of Acorns products.', 'Mission:', 'Optimistic about the potential of societal change.', "At Acorns, we're building a financial wellness system that enables everyday Americans to save and invest every day. We are transforming the category and recruiting a team that is relentless at fulfilling our mission. The Acorns team comes together every day to deliver a revolutionary product to its customers, the up-and-coming. If you thrive in an environment where you can push yourself beyond all previous thresholds of possibility, come join us at Acorns.", 'An ability to explain complex problems in a simple way.', 'Collaborated with the Product Management team to plan projects and recommend areas for the next generation of Acorns products.Partnered with Engineering teams to deliver data science solutions into the product with proper API design.Be able to responsibly represent the Data Science team with other departments.', "You are not expected to have experience with all the listed requirements. If you feel passionately about Acorns' mission, vision and values, please apply.\xa0", 'Within 6 months, you will:', 'Python or Scala, with related statistical and machine learning packages.', 'Learn Acorns products, data warehouse, and how data fits into the products.Discover new opportunities to apply data science concepts to the portfolio of products.Present findings to the Data Science team members.Interact with multiple teams.', 'Proposed novel ML research directions that will eventually power new products.', "A belief that your work is tied to your life's mission.", 'The Acorns Data Science group is focused on solving problems that directly affect customers, including recommendation engines, fraud prevention, and customer intention inference. But these aren’t Kaggle-type problems; we operate with urgency and often with imperfect data. We know that solving problems with data is an art and a science. Data Scientists at Acorns are as good at communicating and collaborating as they are at building models and writing code.', 'Knowledge of basic macroeconomic concepts.', 'Numerous career possibilities that allow you to grow with Acorns.', 'Experience writing production quality, version-controlled code.', 'Be able to responsibly represent the Data Science team with other departments.', 'Flexible paid time off.', 'Present findings to the Data Science team members.', 'Acorns is actively seeking a motivated, detail-oriented, and solution-focused Data Scientist. This position will reside in the Data Science group, which serves as the central data science team for the company. The team is responsible for developing and using mathematical modeling, data mining, and machine learning techniques to be agents for good by helping look after the financial best interests of the up-and-coming.', 'Empathy for our customers’ financial situations and the desire to help our customers in need of personalized products and services.The ability to uphold the values of transparency, honesty, and support for the team.An ability to explain complex problems in a simple way.Capability to build algorithms that touch statistics and machine learning.Knowledge of scalable and efficient methods for large scale data analysis and model development.Pride in your work', 'The rare opportunity to create a new world. We inspire one another every day to do meaningful work that solves big societal challenges.', 'The ability to uphold the values of transparency, honesty, and support for the team.', 'Capability to build algorithms that touch statistics and machine learning.', 'MS or Ph.D. in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Physics, Engineering or another quantitative field.\xa0', "Acorns is the leading micro-investing app in the U.S. It allows users to round up their daily purchases and automatically Invest the Change® into a low-cost, diversified portfolio of exchange-traded funds offered by some of the world's top asset managers (including Vanguard and BlackRock). Founded in Newport Beach, Calif., by father and son team Walter and Jeff Cruttenden, Acorns provides a simple entry-point using the Acorns app on iPhone or Android. Customers accumulate fractional shares in one of five portfolios constructed by world-renowned Nobel Laureate economist Dr. Harry Markowitz. Acorns' smart portfolio algorithms automatically work in the background of life, helping users build wealth naturally, pennies at a time. From Acorns mighty oaks do grow.", 'Acorns believes diversity, equity and inclusion are fundamental obligations that strengthen our team. We need a diverse, multi-disciplinary team to build a meaningful company and culture.\xa0', 'A comprehensive benefits package to meet the needs of you and your family.', 'Learn Acorns products, data warehouse, and how data fits into the products.', '3-4+ years of experience in working with noisy real-world structured and semi-structured data.', 'Have established architecture and implementation for an intelligence-driven product feature in a data-rich environment.Made production quality code commits into the team’s repository.Contributed to the broader team’s success by offering ideas and constructive feedback to other team member’s projects.Proposed novel ML research directions that will eventually power new products.', "MS or Ph.D. in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Physics, Engineering or another quantitative field.\xa0Experience writing production quality, version-controlled code.Knowledge of basic macroeconomic concepts.A belief that your work is tied to your life's mission.Optimistic about the potential of societal change.", 'Excellent communication skills\xa0', 'Experience with A/B testing methodologies and experiments.', 'Contributed to the broader team’s success by offering ideas and constructive feedback to other team member’s projects.']

['', 'JOB ID: 18539', 'Ability to clearly communicate technical concepts and analyses with diverse audiences (technical and non-technical)', 'Advanced degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics or other relevant fieldExperienced in machine learning model creationExperienced in designing, operating, and analyzing large-scale experiments', 'Nice to Have', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics or other relevant field3+ years of experience in analytics, statistics, mathematics, computer science, machine learning, or a similar quantitative fieldExperience in data scripting languages (SQL and Python) (R would be a plus) and data visualization software (Power BI)Strong SQL and Python programming skillsAbility to derive insight from analysis, recommend actions, and communicate with stakeholdersAbility to clearly communicate technical concepts and analyses with diverse audiences (technical and non-technical)', 'We’re all about people and community. Since 2002, we have offered technology staffing and managed services for the great Seattle area. We focus on getting to know our clients and candidates to create lasting partnerships and ensure success. Not only do we provide a wide variety of benefits like medical and dental, but we are also committed to inspiring and creating positive change in the world with our community outreach programs. You will join a large team of professionals who are passionate about their careers as well as their community. For more career opportunities or to refer a friend, please visit\xa0http://wimmersolutions.com/careers.', 'Work with product and business teams to identify important questions and answer them with data', 'At Wimmer Solutions, we’ve built a reputation for results-driven, innovative, business and technology solutions that help companies execute on their strategic initiatives. We custom tailor our services to fit our clients’ needs from consulting and technology process outsourcing to interim technical talent resourcing.', 'As required, create dashboards that track product performance', 'Ability to derive insight from analysis, recommend actions, and communicate with stakeholders', 'Select features, build, and optimize machine learning models that solve real business problems', 'We’re looking for an individual who is excited to apply their analytical skills to deliver insights and help us make smarter decisions. Your primary focus will be in data mining, report generation, conducting statistical analysis, and building predictive machine learning models that we can integrate into our product or processes. As a data scientist, you will work with a dynamic team of product managers and engineers to deliver sophisticated machine learning solutions.', 'Experienced in designing, operating, and analyzing large-scale experiments', 'Conduct data mining over variety of sources with varying complexities', 'DATA SCIENTIST\xa0', 'What We’re Looking For', 'Must be able to work for a US based company without requiring visa sponsorship.', 'Work with engineering to deploy models to production and influence data architecture and telemetry', '3+ years of experience in analytics, statistics, mathematics, computer science, machine learning, or a similar quantitative field', 'Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis', 'Conduct ad-hoc analysis and present results in clear manner', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics or other relevant field', 'What You Will Do', 'Work with product and business teams to identify important questions and answer them with dataConduct data mining over variety of sources with varying complexitiesProcessing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysisSelect features, build, and optimize machine learning models that solve real business problemsWork with engineering to deploy models to production and influence data architecture and telemetryConduct ad-hoc analysis and present results in clear mannerAs required, create dashboards that track product performance', 'Experienced in machine learning model creation', 'Strong SQL and Python programming skills', 'Experience in data scripting languages (SQL and Python) (R would be a plus) and data visualization software (Power BI)', 'Advanced degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics or other relevant field', 'MORE ABOUT WIMMER SOLUTIONS\xa0']

['Company Insight', 'Design, develop and test real-time software for low-latency algorithmic trading, risk management and trade reporting.', 'Collaborate closely with quant researchers and peers in technology to ensure consistency and maximize re-use of software components globally.', 'Your Role:', "The general set up is very collaborative and you'll have the opportunity to work across the business to generate and test new ideas.", 'You must be eligible to live and work in the US.', 'Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.', 'Further Context:', 'Strong C++ or Java or Python programming experience.', 'Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.', 'Strong C++ or Java or Python programming experience.Analyzing large amounts of data and complex systems on a daily basis.Advanced mathematical and statistical modeling skills, including time-series and cross-sectional analysis, or similar.No prior finance experience necessary.', 'Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy', 'This is a permanent position with a highly competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.', 'Experience Required:', '\xa0', 'The company is a world leading investment manager with offices throughout North America, Europe and Asia. The firm utilizes state of the art technology to trade the global financial markets. They are a true quantitative investment manager who have established a world class research team of some of the highest caliber researchers in their specialized fields. Due to diversification of research they are looking for a software engineer to join the desk and focus on the design of and coding of algorithms to further facilitate the execution of systematic trading strategies.', "The firm has an excellent culture and is one of the most reputable in the industry, with a track record of delivering advanced custom tech and constant innovation.The general set up is very collaborative and you'll have the opportunity to work across the business to generate and test new ideas.This is a permanent position with a highly competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.", "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract or remote work.", 'Analyzing large amounts of data and complex systems on a daily basis.', 'Build execution algorithms that bring trading strategies to life.', "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract or remote work.You must be eligible to live and work in the US.Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy", 'Build execution algorithms that bring trading strategies to life.Design, develop and test real-time software for low-latency algorithmic trading, risk management and trade reporting.Collaborate closely with quant researchers and peers in technology to ensure consistency and maximize re-use of software components globally.', 'The firm has an excellent culture and is one of the most reputable in the industry, with a track record of delivering advanced custom tech and constant innovation.', 'Advanced mathematical and statistical modeling skills, including time-series and cross-sectional analysis, or similar.', 'Pre-Application:', 'No prior finance experience necessary.']

['', 'Working knowledge of dimensional modeling techniques', 'API development experience is a plus', 'The ability to deal with ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams - both technical and non technical, and a strong empathy for the customer experience', 'Job Requirements', 'Design data warehouse solutions using dimensional methodologies to support ETL processes and data analytics applications', 'Experience working with Linux is a plus', 'Create code that meets design specifications, follows standards, and is easy to maintain', 'Experience creating and maintaining automated data pipelines', 'Develop and unit test assigned features to meet product requirements', 'Develop, implement and tune ETL processes', 'Drive our data platform and help evolve our technology stack and development best practices', 'As a Senior Data Engineer for the Data Engineering Team, your job is to integrate, sanitize, and productize our massive store of market and user data to turn it into a competitive weapon.\xa0 You will have ownership of Redfin’s Data Warehouse platform, overall architecture, data integration and operational excellence.\xa0 You will also be working closely with the marketing team to provide key business KPIs and enable marketing automation.', 'Own features that you develop end to end.\xa0 Work with end users on requirements gathering, develop and test your code, implement new processes in production, then maintain and support them over time', 'The ability to work within an Agile/Scrum development process', 'Architectural insight on where to store data and modeling experience to recommend how it should be structured to make it accessible, performant, and resilient to change', 'To make sure we hire the most qualified people, we’ve designed a multi-step selection process which may include interviews, a homework assignment, and a reference check. ['', 'Dedication to details', 'Experience contributing to the architecture and design of web-based applicationsKnowledge of Javascript or TypeScript UI frameworks such as Angular or ReactExperience working in an Agile/Scrum environment', 'You will work across all tiers leveraging Service-Oriented Architecture, progressive web applications, mobile applications, user experience, analytics and integrations.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent3+ years of professional experience in software development with Java, C#, or other object-oriented languageGood understanding of object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, and problem solvingStrong communication and interpersonal skillsKnowledge of software engineering practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Solution Shapers\xa0- We lift ceilings, pave runways, and forge a better new way.Health Champions\xa0- We promote the whole health of our team and members.Community Builders\xa0- Every day we create an authentic connection with our members and one another.Intentionally Not Status Quo\xa0- Our service and product experience are distinctly refreshing and always excellent.Rooted in Love\xa0- Love is central, so we strive to treat everyone as we’d like to be treated.', 'Launched in 2015, Sedera is a fast-growing community of like-minded members from all across the nation sharing one another’s medical costs. Through stewarding this Medical Cost Sharing community, we seek not only to empower individuals to take control of their healthcare decisions but revolutionize the status quo health care payment system.', 'You will build products and services for Sedera customers, members, partners, and internal users.You will work across all tiers leveraging Service-Oriented Architecture, progressive web applications, mobile applications, user experience, analytics and integrations.You will work closely with the product team to create innovative applications to help drive business growth and user engagement.', 'Experience contributing to the architecture and design of web-based applications', 'Knowledge of Javascript or TypeScript UI frameworks such as Angular or React', 'Come As "You"', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent', 'Lowering the Cost of Health Care. Together.', 'Does this sound like you?', '3+ years of professional experience in software development with Java, C#, or other object-oriented language', 'Able to understand complex concepts and explain them in simple terms', 'Come as you are, and come with a commitment to be Rooted In Love. We welcome anyone to join the Sedera team regardless of race or color, sex or sexual orientation or gender identity, national origin or familial status, age, disability, religious beliefs, or any other attributes that make you "you." We do not tolerate discrimination, prejudice or harassment, or anything else that negates our underlying values.', 'A fun place to work - Sedera is a back-to-back winner of Austin Business Journal\'s "Best Places to Work" award in 2019 & 2020 - a great team to be part of, competitive salary, paid Sedera membership, Dental and Vision, 401(k) with matching, cell phone stipend, unlimited vacation days, free gym membership, and other optional benefits.', 'Software Engineer', 'Our ideal Software Engineer is looking for a role in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where they can help build and lead a high performance team. You are motivated by challenges and love to see innovative ideas transform through technology into tangible, finished products. You resonate with the mission of Sedera and ultimately believe your work is about helping solve larger problems in the wider community.\xa0', 'Health Champions\xa0- We promote the whole health of our team and members.', 'Love learning new concepts and personal challenges; curious by nature; inquisitive', 'Solution Shapers\xa0- We lift ceilings, pave runways, and forge a better new way.', 'Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment', 'Our dream team member', 'Knowledge of software engineering practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations', 'Solution Shapers', 'You will build products and services for Sedera customers, members, partners, and internal users.', 'Love of technology', 'Good understanding of object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, and problem solving', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Enthusiastic work ethicLove of technologyDedication to detailsLove learning new concepts and personal challenges; curious by nature; inquisitiveConfident communicator; comfortable working with all areas of an organizationEmpathy for people and a desire to help others growAble to understand complex concepts and explain them in simple termsDriven to constantly improve ', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills', 'You will work closely with the product team to create innovative applications to help drive business growth and user engagement.', 'Community Builders\xa0- Every day we create an authentic connection with our members and one another.', 'Intentionally Not Status Quo', 'What you’ll do', 'Senior Software Engineer ', 'Empathy for people and a desire to help others grow', 'Confident communicator; comfortable working with all areas of an organization', 'Every Sedera Team Member is Driven by a Commitment to Live out These Values:', 'Rooted in Love\xa0- Love is central, so we strive to treat everyone as we’d like to be treated.', 'Enthusiastic work ethic', 'A Senior Software Engineer at Sedera will build new technical solutions to improve the overall software capabilities of Sedera:', 'Driven to constantly improve ', 'Intentionally Not Status Quo\xa0- Our service and product experience are distinctly refreshing and always excellent.', 'Community Builders', 'What We Will Include', 'Health Champions', 'Rooted in Love']

['', '• Experience with R', '• Experience with Databricks', '• Design and implement ingestion pipelines to handle and transform large amounts of structured and semi-structured data from a multitude of sources.', '• Collaborate with the technology and analytics teams on developing new conventions and processes.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bonus!', '• Design monitoring around ingestion and processing tasks and develop runbooks in case of an outage.', '• Experience with Airflow or Luigi', 'Requirements:', '• Experience building RESTful APIs for serving processed data', 'As a Data Engineer, you will be working on projects that help bridge the gap between the engineering and analytics teams. ['', 'At least 4 years of experience working in industry.', 'Interested in becoming a core team member of a company with strong unicorn potential that is revolutionizing conversational AI?', 'Good communication skills and writing skills, including the ability to write documentation.', "Over the past 5+ years we've developed ground-breaking, commercially proven second generation AGI-based technology and are now ready to rapidly expand into a wide range of commercial applications. We are now looking to expand our already awesome, well-established team.", "We believe this is one of the most exciting and interesting projects in the world. We're in a fast-moving environment and there are excellent opportunities for significant advancement for self-motivated, disciplined candidates dedicated to our project.", '\u200b', 'Experience in developing API infrastructure, cloud deployment, and complex algorithms', '\xa0', 'ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS', 'Must submit a cover letter to be considered for this position.\xa0Contact us\xa0jobs@aigo.ai', 'If all this sounds like a good match and exciting to you, please send your resume and cover letter', 'This position offers compensation commensurate with experience, including share options, medical insurance, and 401k match.', 'You will work closely with our CEO/ Chief Scientist and the rest of the team. You will be actively involved in advancing our AGI framework and commercial platform architecture and design. This is a great opportunity to join a highly experienced and well-established AGI effort as a key member.', 'High level of intelligence combined with strong motivation to work on advanced AI.', 'The ability to rapidly (self-) learn new technologies and skills.', 'At least 3 year of practical experience programming in C#/.NET (Core)', 'At least 4 years of experience working in industry.At least 3 year of practical experience programming in C#/.NET (Core)Experience in developing API infrastructure, cloud deployment, and complex algorithmsGood communication skills and writing skills, including the ability to write documentation.High level of intelligence combined with strong motivation to work on advanced AI.The ability to rapidly (self-) learn new technologies and skills.Strong communication and cooperability skills', 'Strong communication and cooperability skills', 'Aigo.ai Inc is seeking two smart, hard-working, highly competent senior software engineers passionate about advancing AI technology for our fast-growing commercial division. The position entails developing and improving interfaces, cloud deployment and other tools, as well as complex algorithms for our novel conversational AI platform. Experience with AI is not specifically required. We require the ability to acquire competence in new fields quickly, as the position necessitates learning new technologies and techniques on the job.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About You:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users']

['', 'One of the following:5+ years professional programming experience3+ years programming experience plus bachelor’s degree2+ years programming experience plus engineering bachelor’s degree1+ years professional programming experience plus master’s degree in computer science or related', 'Our client generally has high expectations of their team members and, thus, of their candidates. The candidates who stand out to them generally have these same high expectations of themselves and it shows in their demeanor, their drive, and the way they talk about both their failures and successes.', 'Demonstrated ability to mentor others in software development projects from conception all the way through release and into maintenance.', 'Able to provide high level problem solving, direct support of customers, and capture customer needs.', 'Our client’s culture is anti-micromanaging which means team members should not have to be pushed by a manager to perform exceptionally. In addition, this means you need to be able to hit the ground running from day one, be self-motivated, resourceful and have the confidence to speak up when you need help or guidance.', 'They’ve found that typical higher education degrees alone, even in directly applicable fields such as Software Programming, do not prepare candidates for a beginning position with our client. In addition to a degree they are looking for candidates with extensive intern experience, personal projects or at least one to two years direct professional experience in the field for an entry position', '2+ years programming experience plus engineering bachelor’s degree', 'Throughout the hiring process our client is looking for candidates who are team players and demonstrate that they are:Hungry – Truly hungry for a challenge, self-motivated, reliable and diligent.Humble - Possessing a humility that openly acknowledges the accomplishments of others, accepts criticism, shares credit and emphasizes team over self.Smart – Wicked smart in a needed area, having a speedy learning curve, strong problem-solving skills and a demonstration of good judgment and intuition.“Sknacky” – They possess a “certain something.” it’s tough to define, but it includes a heightened enthusiasm when faced with a new or particularly complex challenge as well as the natural ability to look at problems from multiple perspectives and creatively problem-solve.Our client generally has high expectations of their team members and, thus, of their candidates. The candidates who stand out to them generally have these same high expectations of themselves and it shows in their demeanor, their drive, and the way they talk about both their failures and successes.Our client’s culture is anti-micromanaging which means team members should not have to be pushed by a manager to perform exceptionally. In addition, this means you need to be able to hit the ground running from day one, be self-motivated, resourceful and have the confidence to speak up when you need help or guidance.They’ve found that typical higher education degrees alone, even in directly applicable fields such as Software Programming, do not prepare candidates for a beginning position with our client. In addition to a degree they are looking for candidates with extensive intern experience, personal projects or at least one to two years direct professional experience in the field for an entry position', 'Smart – Wicked smart in a needed area, having a speedy learning curve, strong problem-solving skills and a demonstration of good judgment and intuition.', 'New programming languages and design patterns are quickly mastered.', 'Able to take a software development project from early stages through release. ['', 'Access Partnership enables consumer access to technology.\xa0To do this, we create the environment that allows governments to adopt technologies effectively and responsibly by analysing global trends for the risks and opportunities they create for technology businesses and users of technology, identifying strategies to mitigate those risks and driving opportunities to our clients’ advantage.\xa0Our firm uniquely mixes public policy and engineering competencies to achieve our goals.\xa0We have five offices around the world and are growing.', 'Closing date for applications: Friday 30th October 2020', 'Undergraduate degree or certificate in cybersecurity, AI, computer science, electrical engineering, or other IT discipline with graduate degree in foreign policy, security studies, law (JD), public administration, or international trade (or vice versa)', 'This position requires leadership capabilities, excellent analytical and communication skills, and an ability to identify, formulate and present complex information in a clear and concise manner both verbally and in writing. You'll have the opportunity to create a meaningful impact on the overall information security capabilities.", ' Oversee developer and operational documentation,and troubleshoot run-time issues ', "Bloomberg runs on data. It's our business and our product. From the biggest banks to the most elite hedge funds, financial institutions need timely, accurate data to capture opportunities and evaluate risk in a dynamic market. In order to provide this level of service and the security required to protect it, the Security Data Platform team provides a platform that transforms petabytes of structured and unstructured data such as text, time series, and events into machine-readable knowledge fueling numerous security focused applications. The platform which supports these efforts is critical to its success.That's where you come in. Working in a talented multi-disciplinary team, you will be responsible for the research, development, and stability of a new Information security data platform. This role offers the ability to innovate and invent, helping define the technical foundations of this essential platform. ['', 'Qualifications:', 'Dedication to continuous integration and automated testing', 'Responsibilities:', '100% Paid Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance for Employees, 90% for Dependents', 'As a member of our technical staff, you’ll be working on our cloud-based systems that ingest a wide variety of data, run advanced machine learning algorithms on that data, use data science techniques to discover trends and detect anomalies, and allow users to ask questions and get answers – and do it all at scale with ever-increasing amounts of data.', 'Participate in customer meetings to present and discuss technical plans and milestones', 'Strong background in agile, and ability to mentor others in its use a major plus', 'Experience working within C2S or similar classified networks', 'About Orbital', "Note to Recruiters and Placement Agencies:\xa0Orbital Insight does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Furthermore, any resumes sent without an agreement in place will be considered your company's gift to Orbital Insight and may be forwarded to our recruiters for their attention.", 'This position will be based in our Arlington, Virginia office but may require some work at customer sites in the DC area.
