['', 'Experience building efficient Web components from visual designs and UX concepts.', 'Solid Object-Oriented Software design and development skills.', "A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or comparable discipline) with 3-5+ years in Web-based Software development, preferably in a medical device or healthcare environment. ", 'Internalize and follow all proper procedures to ensure compliance of Software components and development process with applicable regulations and safety standards (ISO 13485, IEC 62304 and U.S Title 21 CFR 820).', 'Strong self-motivation and professional pride in your work product.', 'Participate in Agile ceremonies, Sprint planning, Backlog grooming, and routine stand-ups.', 'Experience with source and version control systems and bug tracking tools.', 'Experience with C++ backend, preferably in Microsoft Windows.', 'Design, develop, integrate, and deploy Software applications for a robot-assisted medical device system in the field of joint replacement.', 'The ideal Software Engineer will have / be', 'Implement UI/UX and visual designs in Web-based technologies utilizing TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. ', 'Strong skills in Web-based technologies and frameworks, React or Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frontend development.', ' Design, develop, integrate, and deploy Software applications for a robot-assisted medical device system in the field of joint replacement. Work with cross-functional teams, Marketing, Hardware Engineering, and contractors across the globe to ensure high-quality product delivery and maintenance for Corin customers. ', 'Excellent interpersonal, communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.', 'Ensure high code quality through automated and rigorous unit tests, code reviews, and adhering to Corin’s coding standards.', 'Support Software Quality Assurance, and verification and validation activities to ensure system quality, functionality, and performance.', 'The key responsibilities of the Software Engineer will be to;', 'Strong ability to rapidly code and unit test in a team environment, utilizing Agile processes and tools such as Azure DevOPS.', 'Requirements', 'Benefits', 'Create and update Software requirements and Software design documentation.', ' Strong skills in Web-based technologies and frameworks, React or Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frontend development. Experience building efficient Web components from visual designs and UX concepts. Experience with C++ backend, preferably in Microsoft Windows. Solid Object-Oriented Software design and development skills. Strong ability to rapidly code and unit test in a team environment, utilizing Agile processes and tools such as Azure DevOPS. Experience with source and version control systems and bug tracking tools. Excellent interpersonal, communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills. Strong self-motivation and professional pride in your work product. ', 'Collaborate within the Software team to enable efficient implementation of complex surgical workflows and 3D models.', ' Implement UI/UX and visual designs in Web-based technologies utilizing TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.  Collaborate within the Software team to enable efficient implementation of complex surgical workflows and 3D models. Ensure high code quality through automated and rigorous unit tests, code reviews, and adhering to Corin’s coding standards. Create and update Software requirements and Software design documentation. Support Software Quality Assurance, and verification and validation activities to ensure system quality, functionality, and performance. Participate in Agile ceremonies, Sprint planning, Backlog grooming, and routine stand-ups. Participate in technology innovation, risk assessment, and relevant project meetings. Internalize and follow all proper procedures to ensure compliance of Software components and development process with applicable regulations and safety standards (ISO 13485, IEC 62304 and U.S Title 21 CFR 820). Strictly follow Good Documentation Practices, and Corin’s Software Development Lifecycle policies. ', 'Strictly follow Good Documentation Practices, and Corin’s Software Development Lifecycle policies.', 'Work with cross-functional teams, Marketing, Hardware Engineering, and contractors across the globe to ensure high-quality product delivery and maintenance for Corin customers.', 'Participate in technology innovation, risk assessment, and relevant project meetings.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Tech Lead), Infrastructure, Education
job_text: ['', ' Analyze and improve reliability, performance, and security of CZI Education’s products and build shared components that benefit multiple teams and products at once Design, build, and maintain core infrastructure services in AWS and Heroku, and in the process managing infrastructure as code using Terraform Design and improve developer infrastructure including including CI pipelines, continuous deployment processes, monitoring and observability tools, and development environments Identify and automate critical workflows improving team efficiency and software quality Build off of and contribute back to the open-source ecosystem Provide technical leadership across the team. ', 'Experience building tools for application performance, continuous integration and deployment, or developer environments', ' We aim to be daring, but humble: We look for bold ideas — regardless of structure and stage — and help them scale by pairing engineers with subject matter experts to build tools that accelerate the pace of social progress. We want to learn fast, but build for the long-term: We want to iterate fast and help bring new solutions to the table, but we also realize that important breakthroughs often take decades, or even centuries. Stay close to the real problems: We engage directly in the communities we serve because no one understands our society’s challenges like those who live them every day.  ', 'Experience with a scripting language such as Ruby or Python', 'We aim to be daring, but humble: We look for bold ideas — regardless of structure and stage — and help them scale by pairing engineers with subject matter experts to build tools that accelerate the pace of social progress.', ' 5+ years relevant coding experience Experience with Amazon Web Services or similar cloud services Experience building tools for application performance, continuous integration and deployment, or developer environments Experience with a scripting language such as Ruby or Python Shown ability to independently define project requirements and ship high-quality software', 'Provide technical leadership across the team.', 'Shown ability to independently define project requirements and ship high-quality software', 'Analyze and improve reliability, performance, and security of CZI Education’s products and build shared components that benefit multiple teams and products at once', 'Stay close to the real problems: We engage directly in the communities we serve because no one understands our society’s challenges like those who live them every day. ', 'You will', '5+ years relevant coding experience', 'Design, build, and maintain core infrastructure services in AWS and Heroku, and in the process managing infrastructure as code using Terraform', 'Identify and automate critical workflows improving team efficiency and software quality', 'We want to learn fast, but build for the long-term: We want to iterate fast and help bring new solutions to the table, but we also realize that important breakthroughs often take decades, or even centuries.', 'Our Values', 'The Opportunity', 'You have', 'Design and improve developer infrastructure including including CI pipelines, continuous deployment processes, monitoring and observability tools, and development environments', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services or similar cloud services', 'Build off of and contribute back to the open-source ecosystem']

job_title: Sr. Business Systems Analyst, Sales & Marketing
job_text: ['', 'Preferred: Experience as a business analyst, administrator, project manager, architect, product manager, or in a sales strategy or sales operations role, particularly in support of Sales, Services, or Customer Success / Renewals organizations.', 'Responsibilities', 'You are comfortable in a distributed, diverse environment, and are able to work remotely and independently. You prioritize your own tasks and collaborate with others to ensure that work is done in a timely manner, with a sharp eye for quality and scale.', 'Ability to craft your calendar with flexible locations and schedules for many roles', 'Proficient in Salesforce Lightning features and functionality', 'Embracing parenthood with minimum of 16 weeks of parental leave', 'Contribute to prioritization of technology efforts across all of the field operations portfolio.', "You have strong interpersonal skills, and you're comfortable interacting with senior leaders. Because of your familiarity with agile development / sprint planning and your understanding of the software development lifecycle, you’re used to negotiating priorities and tradeoffs.", 'Competitive pay based on the work you do here and not your previous salary ', 'Experience in creating/updating system documentation including configuration changes, data mapping requirements, functional designs, test cases and enablement plans as needed for the engagement', 'Double your charitable giving - We match up to $1500 (or local currency equivalent)', 'Up to 40 hours each year to use toward volunteer projects you love', 'Become an authority on our Sales & Marketing suite of tools, leading business reviews with current vendors to optimize value and conducting technical evaluations for new vendors as needed', 'Salesforce feature requests and documentation: you will collaborate with analysts and stakeholders to create and prioritize feature requests, and then shepherd them through development and testing.', 'Maintain a holistic view of all business system processes and users, to understand functional impacts with regard to configuration, process, workflow and reporting.', 'Assist with system configuration and user setup as needed. You may help set up fields, workflows, roles/permissions, page layouts, custom objects, custom record types, reports, and dashboards.', 'Develop expertise in Elastic top of funnel process and workflows with solid understanding of impact to business metrics and forecasting', 'Preferred: Salesforce Lightning experience and Reporting & Dashboard experience / Advanced Admin certification', "5+ years of experience working with Salesforce.com. You have strong past exposure to Marketo or a similar marketing automation tool. You’re also a power-user of Excel, Powerpoint, process documentation tools, and data loaders.You have strong interpersonal skills, and you're comfortable interacting with senior leaders. Because of your familiarity with agile development / sprint planning and your understanding of the software development lifecycle, you’re used to negotiating priorities and tradeoffs.You have an ability to diagnose and troubleshoot issues with a customer-first, positive approach, and you design with empathy and a mind for simplicity and scale.You're an excellent teammate, with the ability to work in a dynamic environment that is fast-paced, where requirements and circumstances evolve quickly. You're more than capable of balancing your daily tasks along with major projects.You're self-motivated, able to work remotely and independently.Preferred: Salesforce Lightning experience and Reporting & Dashboard experience / Advanced Admin certificationPreferred: Experience as a business analyst, administrator, project manager, architect, product manager, or in a sales strategy or sales operations role, particularly in support of Sales, Services, or Customer Success / Renewals organizations.", "You're self-motivated, able to work remotely and independently.", 'Health coverage for you and your family in many locations', '5+ years of experience working with Salesforce.com. You have strong past exposure to Marketo or a similar marketing automation tool. You’re also a power-user of Excel, Powerpoint, process documentation tools, and data loaders.', 'Maintain a holistic view of all business system processes and users, to understand functional impacts with regard to configuration, process, workflow and reporting.Proficient in Salesforce Lightning features and functionalityBecome an authority on our Sales & Marketing suite of tools, leading business reviews with current vendors to optimize value and conducting technical evaluations for new vendors as neededCollaborate closely with our Marketing & Sales Enablement teams to reinforce manager expectations in Salesforce across lead qualification, sales activity tracking, and opportunity managementDevelop expertise in Elastic top of funnel process and workflows with solid understanding of impact to business metrics and forecastingExperience in creating/updating system documentation including configuration changes, data mapping requirements, functional designs, test cases and enablement plans as needed for the engagementSalesforce feature requests and documentation: you will collaborate with analysts and stakeholders to create and prioritize feature requests, and then shepherd them through development and testing.Serve as a technical mentor and partner to analysts and stakeholder groups within field operations.Assist with system configuration and user setup as needed. You may help set up fields, workflows, roles/permissions, page layouts, custom objects, custom record types, reports, and dashboards.Contribute to prioritization of technology efforts across all of the field operations portfolio.You are comfortable in a distributed, diverse environment, and are able to work remotely and independently. You prioritize your own tasks and collaborate with others to ensure that work is done in a timely manner, with a sharp eye for quality and scale.', 'Collaborate closely with our Marketing & Sales Enablement teams to reinforce manager expectations in Salesforce across lead qualification, sales activity tracking, and opportunity management', 'Generous number of vacation days each year', 'Key Skills', 'Competitive pay based on the work you do here and not your previous salary Health coverage for you and your family in many locationsAbility to craft your calendar with flexible locations and schedules for many rolesGenerous number of vacation days each yearDouble your charitable giving - We match up to $1500 (or local currency equivalent)Up to 40 hours each year to use toward volunteer projects you loveEmbracing parenthood with minimum of 16 weeks of parental leave', 'You have an ability to diagnose and troubleshoot issues with a customer-first, positive approach, and you design with empathy and a mind for simplicity and scale.', "You're an excellent teammate, with the ability to work in a dynamic environment that is fast-paced, where requirements and circumstances evolve quickly. You're more than capable of balancing your daily tasks along with major projects.", 'Serve as a technical mentor and partner to analysts and stakeholder groups within field operations.']

['At present, due to COVID 19, all employees are working from home remote at this time.*Our MissionTo a ctively connect people to their next great opportunity. At ZipRecruiter, we foster a culture where our employees feel accepted, supported and celebrated. Our employees find ethical solutions to empower the community and workforce. Differences make us stronger, and we embrace them.Who We AreZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. ['', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar degree preferred2-4 years of experience in commercial SaaS software development requiredSignificant experience working with database querying and optimizationExperience with reporting platforms (Power BI) is preferredExperience in C#, .NET Core – knowledge of Python a bonusExperience with React or Angular is a plusProfessional full stack development experience is preferredDemonstrated ability to build relationships to solve challengesExperience in API design and developmentPrefer experience with virtualization/container technologies such as DockerPrefer experience developing in multiple technologies on multiple platforms", 'OnShift is a B2B Software Company headquartered in the theater district of Cleveland, Ohio. We provide cloud-based human capital management software designed for the post-acute care market. You’d recognize our clients as retirement communities, nursing homes, assisted living communities and others in the post-acute healthcare spectrum. OnShift has secured a range of awards highlighting our technology innovation and business growth. Notable awards include: 2019 OHTec – Tech Company of the Year, 2019 Deloitte Technology Fast 500 winner, 2018 Weatherhead 100 winner, 2017 OHTec Best Healthcare Tech Product, 2017 Deloitte Technology Fast 500 winner, 2017 Weatherhead 100 winner, and many more!', 'Work closely with the BI/Reporting team (which product managers) to scope, plan, and build solutions that drive OnShift forwardWrite code on with product teams, spending 80-90% time in hands on developmentTake initiative on solving technical problems as they arisePrioritize quality initiatives and factors in your own code and through the pull request process for your team and other team’s membersHelp refine and cultivate OnShift’s technical standards and Agile processes', '2-4 years of experience in commercial SaaS software development required', 'Professional full stack development experience is preferred', 'Write code on with product teams, spending 80-90% time in hands on development', 'Experience in API design and development', 'Take initiative on solving technical problems as they arise', 'We believe in equal employment and advancement opportunities for all people, based on ability, potential and record of accomplishment.', 'Experience with React or Angular is a plus', 'Demonstrated ability to build relationships to solve challenges', 'Prioritize quality initiatives and factors in your own code and through the pull request process for your team and other team’s members', 'Software is one of the most interesting industries to work in today and healthcare is the place to be in Cleveland in 2020 - combining those, as we do, is what makes our business so compelling. We’re growing fast, we love what we do and we do it with passion.', 'As an organization, we value people who are dedicated and innovative and we reward them with challenging work, competitive pay, solid benefits, equity participation, career growth, and personal development', 'EEO STATEMENT', 'Help refine and cultivate OnShift’s technical standards and Agile processes', 'WHO WE ARE', '\ufeffA DAY IN THE LIFE', 'Prefer experience developing in multiple technologies on multiple platforms', 'Experience with reporting platforms (Power BI) is preferred', 'DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES?', 'Experience in C#, .NET Core – knowledge of Python a bonus', 'Prefer experience with virtualization/container technologies such as Docker', 'Significant experience working with database querying and optimization', 'Work closely with the BI/Reporting team (which product managers) to scope, plan, and build solutions that drive OnShift forward', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar degree preferred", 'We are seeking a BI Software Engineer\xa0to join a growing Product Development team. You will have the opportunity to work in an exciting stack including .NET Core, C#, React, and PostgreSQL. As an Engineer you will have the opportunity to work cross-functionally with embedded Product Owners, Ops and QA. You will leverage cutting edge technologies while working in Agile teams. Everyone has a voice as your entire team actively participates in Scrum practices. In addition, the Product Development team is dedicated to providing a unique learning culture supporting personal growth time (Saw Time and continuous education opportunities)!']

job_title: Data Analytics Python developer/ hedge fund
job_text: ['', 'Strong analytical, development, and modeling skills', 'Contribute to the design efforts of the library', 'If interested, please apply with a copy of your resume and we will be in touch soon!', 'Financial experience highly preferred', 'Help lead the thought process behind library development by proposing and researching new technologiesCode in Python to develop a brand new leading-edge analytics libraryContribute to the design efforts of the libraryWork with research teams to implement new strategiesBuild new visualization and reporting tools to help portfolio managers and researchers with model performance', 'Code in Python to develop a brand new leading-edge analytics library', 'Qualifications:', 'Work with research teams to implement new strategies', 'Graduate degree in Computer Science or a quantitative disciple from a top university preferredMinimum of 3+ years of professional experience with Python (Pandas, Python, Numpy, Scipy) developmentFinancial experience highly preferredStrong analytical, development, and modeling skills', 'Graduate degree in Computer Science or a quantitative disciple from a top university preferred', 'Help lead the thought process behind library development by proposing and researching new technologies', 'Minimum of 3+ years of professional experience with Python (Pandas, Python, Numpy, Scipy) development', 'Responsibilities:', 'Our client a well esablished hedge fund with 100B AUM is looking for a Data Analytics Python developer with AWS exp. They will be\xa0utilizing Python (Pandas, Python, Numpy, Scipy) for the development of a Data Analytics platform.. The successful candidate will need to have very solid programming skills and some financial instrament knowledge.\xa0', 'Build new visualization and reporting tools to help portfolio managers and researchers with model performance']

['Much of our stack is Java but we are using several other languages (e.g. JavaScript and C#), and are continually investigating new technologies. We are interested in candidates with a diverse technical background. Here is a nonexclusive list of technologies we currently use:', 'You understand the balancing game an engineer has to play while weighing new feature development with technical debt.', 'Amazon Web Services (AWS) – ECS, Lambda, RDS, Kinesis, etc.', "You have a Bachelor's Degree\xa0in Computer Science or related field OR equivalent professional experience.", 'Dropwizard, Grails, Spock', 'Java, JavaScript, C#', '“Good enough” is not in your vocabulary. You find innovative ways to ensure quality without restricting development speed.', 'Understanding, utilizing, and providing guidance on key data store and database technologiesYou view software engineering as a craft and welcome the opportunity to share knowledge with fellow enthusiasts.You find learning new technologies/patterns exciting and love experimenting with them.“Good enough” is not in your vocabulary. You find innovative ways to ensure quality without restricting development speed.You understand the balancing game an engineer has to play while weighing new feature development with technical debt.A blank piece of paper doesn’t scare you. You are excited to design products from the ground up.For you, it’s more than a job.', 'A blank piece of paper doesn’t scare you. You are excited to design products from the ground up.', 'Understanding, utilizing, and providing guidance on key data store and database technologies', 'Our Tech Stack', 'You find learning new technologies/patterns exciting and love experimenting with them.', '\xa0', 'js, Next.js, Express.js', "You have a Bachelor's Degree\xa0in Computer Science or related field OR equivalent professional experience.Java, JavaScript, C#Amazon Web Services (AWS) – ECS, Lambda, RDS, Kinesis, etc.Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB, MS SQL, MongoDBDropwizard, Grails, Spockjs, Next.js, Express.js", 'Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB, MS SQL, MongoDB', 'You view software engineering as a craft and welcome the opportunity to share knowledge with fellow enthusiasts.', 'About You', 'The Engineering department at CommerceHub employs some of the top engineering talent in the area who are constantly working to improve on processes, quality and techniques, with the goal of producing the highest quality software solutions in the industry. The lines between traditional QA and software engineering are blurred here, with quality being considered at all stages of development. Our team is comprised of very talented and highly motivated individuals, who pride themselves on working smarter, not harder. We’re empowered to make local decisions, reducing the overhead of getting things done. We aim for operational excellence, having a DevOps culture and a “you build it, you run it” mentality. We favor a Lean approach to our product development, following agile workflows such as Scrum and Kanban depending on the directive of the team. We welcome new technologies and are constantly self-evaluating our tech stack to make sure we are providing software of the highest quality. Continuous Delivery is important to us and we are constantly looking to improve our automated testing and continuous integration.', 'For you, it’s more than a job.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Platform, Cloud Data Protection
job_text: ['', 'About The Team', 'You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis.', 'You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments.', 'You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores.', 'You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams.', 'About The Job', ' You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure). You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris. You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments. You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis. ', 'About You', 'You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure).', ' You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role. You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores. You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time. You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams. ', 'You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time.', 'You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris.', 'You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role.', 'Rubrik provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Rubrik complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'About Rubrik']

', '4+ years software engineer experience Experience using React is required Next JS is preferred', 'Job Description', 'Experience using React is required ', 'Requirements:', 'Next JS is preferred', '4+ years software engineer experience ', 'Requirements: ', 'Job Description ', ' ']

['', 'Professional experience with a relational database like PostgreSQL', '#LI-REMOTE', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.\xa0', 'Minimum of 3+ years of back end software development experience', 'As a Software Engineer, you will be part of the team helping to grow and attract millions of customers from our highly visible customer facing website. You will be joining a rapidly growing team that cares deeply about each any every customer. Our team values the process of getting a little bit better everyday, whether that improvement be of the product, the code, the team or yourself. Some of the challenges that our team is solving is for rapid scaling and support of new customers, a/b testing user experiences, and resilience of production systems.', 'Competitive salary', 'Competitive salaryStock optionsFlexible schedule and work/life balance100% company-paid health, dental, and vision insuranceChoose your computer setup (Mac or PC)Office snacks and weekly team lunchesTeam building events and activities', 'Software Engineer', 'The Bestow team is a diverse band of first principles thinkers on a mission to do good. We’re fortunate to be backed by leading investors and partners including Valar Ventures, NEA, 8VC and MunichRe.', 'Minimum of 3+ years of back end software development experienceExperience with Golang (Go), Kotlin or RustProfessional experience with Python 3Professional experience with a relational database like PostgreSQLExperience using Docker for local software developmentExperience designing APIs (Protocol Buffers, RAML, Swagger, or OpenAPI)Experience with distributed systems and microservicesAn advocate for Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)', 'Experience with Golang (Go), Kotlin or Rust', 'A Little About You ', 'Bestow does not sponsor applicants for work visas at this time.', 'Experience with distributed systems and microservices', 'An advocate for Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)', 'Bestow is a digital life insurance company built on full stack technology and AI. In a world in need of greater financial resilience and protection, Bestow democratizes access to smart financial products and powers some of the world’s leading consumer platforms. We are reimagining and rebuilding a 400-year-old, $7 trillion industry to create a brighter future for millions of families. And we’re just getting started.', 'Flexible schedule and work/life balance', 'Who We Are', 'Office snacks and weekly team lunches', 'Stock options', 'What We Can Offer to You ', 'Choose your computer setup (Mac or PC)', 'Professional experience with Python 3', 'Experience designing APIs (Protocol Buffers, RAML, Swagger, or OpenAPI)', '100% company-paid health, dental, and vision insurance', 'Experience using Docker for local software development', 'Team building events and activities']

['', 'You will design, integrate and maintain solutions to localization and mapping subsystems for autonomous platforms operating in complex outdoor environments. ['', 'We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation. To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data driven decision making.', 'An extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'You are excited by new technologies but are conscious of choosing them for the right reasons.', 'You are constantly improving the quality of the project you are working on, both via code contributions as well as long-term advocacy for larger scale changes.', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursement', 'Full support for remote work during COVID-19', 'Our team is 90+ engineers, product managers and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar and AppNexus.\xa0', 'About Our Company:\xa0', 'Product Development at our Company', 'Regular company-wide social events (even virtually!)', 'Benefits & Perks', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursementFull support for remote work during COVID-19Daily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to homeRegular company-wide social events (even virtually!)Generous annual education stipend toward job-related external learning opportunitiesAn extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'Daily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to home', 'You understand how to negotiate with Product Management to meet the user’s needs without sacrificing quality or accruing tech debt. Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.Our team is 90+ engineers, product managers and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar and AppNexus.\xa0We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation. To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data driven decision making.', 'Our backend is Java and Python microservices coupled with DynamoDB, Kinesis, AirFlow, MySql, Postgres, and Redis. Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.', 'You have worked professionally with web technologies for 5+ years with experience on a single application long enough to see the consequences of your decisions.You have a proven track record of building applications that maintain a high bar of quality.You understand how to negotiate with Product Management to meet the user’s needs without sacrificing quality or accruing tech debt. You deeply loathe regressions and take proactive steps to protect against them through a variety of testing techniques.You are excited by new technologies but are conscious of choosing them for the right reasons.You are constantly improving the quality of the project you are working on, both via code contributions as well as long-term advocacy for larger scale changes.You are enthusiastic about the high impact, fast-paced work environment of an early stage startup', 'Role Background:', 'We work with 2,000+ of the most innovative brands like Sephora, Coach, Urban Outfitters, CB2, PacSun, Lulus, and Jack in the Box.']

job_text: ['', 'Strong communication skills with consumers at various levels. ', '• Use critical thinking to identify, analyze and interpret trends and patterns in complex data sets to solve problems, and develop recommendations based on findings', 'Location: DALLAS, TX', 'Experienced Analyst / Engineer with data centric experience. ', 'Duration: 12 Months', 'TeradataOracleSQL serverExperience with AWS SageMaker', 'SQL server', 'Duration:', 'Experience with AWS SageMaker', 'Location:', '• Ability to see big picture from various details and articulate the key differentiators to decision makers', 'Required Skills:', 'Unix Shell Scripts', 'At least 10 years of experience in data warehouse architecture, data modeling, ETL Mapping, data flows, data analysis using NoSQL conceptsDemonstrated delivery of results on past projects leveraging various analytics, data integration and management technologies involving both operational and analytical applicationsStrong communication skills with consumers at various levels. Able to present complex and technical information clearly in ‘business language.’Ability to gather data from various systems using database languages and/or programming languages (such as but not limited to)SQL & NoSQLPythonJavaAb InitioUnix Shell Scripts', 'The Engineer will also be responsible for collaborating across business and technology teams to understand the various data domains to support our strategic initiatives. Strategic analysis may include the measurement of baseline or quantitative value on impact; economic and environment landscape that impact our business and industry; or helping uncover dependencies on cross functional areas and data availability.', 'Ab Initio', 'Java', '• Understanding or exposure to modern data management concepts or approaches that enable enterprises adopt digital technologies, such as Events & Rules based solutions, stream analytics, etc.', '#CJ –28982', 'Data Engineer', 'The Data Innovation Team rapidly builds and tests new, cutting-edge data architectures to enable Data Science and Innovation initiatives across the enterprise. ', 'This includes working with the Data Science and Innovation Teams to better understand their data requirements, identifying the right sources for the data, and then rapidly providing the data that will power both the Data Science models and Innovation initiatives.', 'SQL & NoSQL', '• Through collaboration with team members, develop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data quality', '\xa0', 'Job Description:', 'Ability to gather data from various systems using database languages and/or programming languages (such as but not limited to)', 'Demonstrated delivery of results on past projects leveraging various analytics, data integration and management technologies involving both operational and analytical applications', 'Python', 'Must have experience asking effective questions, probing for important details and translating into actionable recommendations. ', 'The Engineer must have a deep understanding of Data Management software and tools in both operational and analytical solutions, the architecture needed to support these solutions, as well as experience in Data Management consulting methods and tools.', 'Teradata', 'Oracle', 'Demonstrated expertise in working with several databases (such as but not limited to):', 'Specifically, the Team is responsible for developing and delivering a Data Innovation Environment that will provision data in new and innovative ways. ', 'The Engineer should possess curiosity, willing to learn emerging technology-based solutions, and passion for ‘all things data’', 'The Engineer will have a primary responsibility to support the prototype activities around data innovation. ', 'At least 10 years of experience in data warehouse architecture, data modeling, ETL Mapping, data flows, data analysis using NoSQL concepts', 'The Data Innovation Team rapidly builds and tests new, cutting-edge data architectures to enable Data Science and Innovation initiatives across the enterprise. Specifically, the Team is responsible for developing and delivering a Data Innovation Environment that will provision data in new and innovative ways. This includes working with the Data Science and Innovation Teams to better understand their data requirements, identifying the right sources for the data, and then rapidly providing the data that will power both the Data Science models and Innovation initiatives.Experienced Analyst / Engineer with data centric experience. Must have experience asking effective questions, probing for important details and translating into actionable recommendations. The Engineer must have a deep understanding of Data Management software and tools in both operational and analytical solutions, the architecture needed to support these solutions, as well as experience in Data Management consulting methods and tools.The Engineer will have a primary responsibility to support the prototype activities around data innovation. The Engineer will also be responsible for collaborating across business and technology teams to understand the various data domains to support our strategic initiatives. Strategic analysis may include the measurement of baseline or quantitative value on impact; economic and environment landscape that impact our business and industry; or helping uncover dependencies on cross functional areas and data availability.The Engineer should possess curiosity, willing to learn emerging technology-based solutions, and passion for ‘all things data’', 'Able to present complex and technical information clearly in ‘business language.’']

job_text: ['', 'The candidate should have proficiency of one or more of the following languages: C/C++/C#/Java/Rust/Go, with Go (aka. golang) experience being ideal. ', 'Requirement:', 'Design APIs to exceed the businesses needs and evangelize those interfaces within the organization', 'The ideal candidate is a creative and curious motivated team player. Big three cloud (AWS, GCS, Azure), configuration management (puppet, salt, ansible, terraform), CI/CD and Kubernetes/docker experience is desirable but not required.', 'Build applications and APIs using the latest best practices and technologies', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', ' Experience with high-throughput systems/APIs, CDNs and strong understanding of HTTP and gRPC semantics is a plus. ', 'What You Will Do', 'Build applications and APIs using the latest best practices and technologiesOptimize applications for optimal performance, painless auto-scaling and efficient resource utilizationDesign APIs to exceed the businesses needs and evangelize those interfaces within the organizationEvangelize delivering software using an agile methodology, true DevOps and gitops CI/CD development practices', 'Evangelize delivering software using an agile methodology, true DevOps and gitops CI/CD development practices', 'We are seeking software developers with experience in systems software or web development.', 'Company Description', 'Optimize applications for optimal performance, painless auto-scaling and efficient resource utilization', 'We are seeking software developers with experience in systems software or web development. Experience with high-throughput systems/APIs, CDNs and strong understanding of HTTP and gRPC semantics is a plus. The candidate should have proficiency of one or more of the following languages: C/C++/C#/Java/Rust/Go, with Go (aka. golang) experience being ideal. The ideal candidate is a creative and curious motivated team player. Big three cloud (AWS, GCS, Azure), configuration management (puppet, salt, ansible, terraform), CI/CD and Kubernetes/docker experience is desirable but not required.']

You must be able to demonstrate the ability to contribute within the change team to tackle challenging requirements and tight timescales.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Confluent Kafka', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to commit and manage expectations with full ownership and follow-up.', 'Reports to: Data Architect', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Parquet or ORC file formats: 4+ years.', '·', 'Proven Data Engineering Patterns and Concepts with Minimum Years of Experience:', 'Bachelor’s Degree in one or more of the following domains: Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Systems or similar.', 'Other Competencies and Characteristics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactive, desire to document and present improvement recommendations consistently.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building batch data pipelines: 4+ years.', 'Learning doesn’t stop', 'Our evolving data engineering tech-stack:', 'Our evolving data engineering tech-stack: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to effectively work through ambiguity, road-blocks and contribute under limited supervision.', 'with the minimum required skills as detailed in the “Required Skills” section below. Only applications submitted directly via this link will be considered:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0AWS Athena: 1+ years.', 'Please note, this is an experienced, hands-on, senior level role requiring at least 5 years of non-academic data engineering experience with the minimum required skills as detailed in the “Required Skills” section below. Only applications submitted directly via this link will be considered: http://bit.ly/LGIMA-DATA-ENGINEER-APPLICATION', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open source data lineage and metadata discovery tools like Marquez and Amundsen.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0AWS IAM: 4+ years.', 'This role will be responsible for re-engineering and modernization of data stores and data pipelines already in place as well as the implementation of net new solutions targeting customer focused value and drive the next generation of products and services. It will involve the build out of both strategic distributed systems as a greenfield development and the improvement and migration of legacy systems.', 'The candidate must be an excellent verbal and written communicator who is able to build strong relationships and act with a fiduciary-like approach working for product teams and business stakeholders, ultimately ensuring that the data product meets their requirements and expectations.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 JSON File Format']

job_text: ['About The Team', '', 'Experience with proficiency in Python or another language', 'Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or a related discipline. ', 'Empower users throughout Zillow to efficiently and securely query Petabytes of data using a Query Platform built on top of Presto and Spark SQL.', 'Excited to establish and promote high standards in DevOps, Security, CI/CD, monitoring, data validation, testing, etc.', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', 'About The Role', 'Apply DevOps principles to analytics and software/data engineering.', 'Implemented config driven, scalable, reliable services and workflows/pipelines using AWS or other cloud services.', 'Experience with Docker, and/or Kubernetes a plus.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills and passionate about collaborating across organizational boundaries.', 'Enable partner teams to reliably and securely process Terabytes of data every day using Airflow.', 'Comfortable distilling informal customer requirements into problem definitions, resolving ambiguity and balancing challenging objectives.', 'Experienced with Spark, Presto, and Airflow or similar technologies.', 'Passionate about data, analytics, and distributed systems.', 'Experience with proficiency in Python or another languageExperienced with Spark, Presto, and Airflow or similar technologies.Implemented config driven, scalable, reliable services and workflows/pipelines using AWS or other cloud services.Excited to establish and promote high standards in DevOps, Security, CI/CD, monitoring, data validation, testing, etc.You have experience in applying automation to data engineering (DataOps)Passionate about data, analytics, and distributed systems.Excellent interpersonal skills and passionate about collaborating across organizational boundaries.Comfortable distilling informal customer requirements into problem definitions, resolving ambiguity and balancing challenging objectives.Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or a related discipline. Experience with Docker, and/or Kubernetes a plus.', 'Research and pioneer the adoption and use of new technologies within Zillow.', 'Design, implement, and operate platforms and tools for securing, processing, and querying data at scale.Empower users throughout Zillow to efficiently and securely query Petabytes of data using a Query Platform built on top of Presto and Spark SQL.Enable partner teams to reliably and securely process Terabytes of data every day using Airflow.Apply DevOps principles to analytics and software/data engineering.Research and pioneer the adoption and use of new technologies within Zillow.', 'You have experience in applying automation to data engineering (DataOps)', 'Design, implement, and operate platforms and tools for securing, processing, and querying data at scale.']

Proficiency in these languages are strongly recommended as well as experience with developing tools integrated with business processes and legacy databases . Apart from the technical skills, the candidate should have strong analytical skills, be able to analyze data and interpret . Candidate should have excellent team and interpersonal skills.', ' Someone who is proficient with building automation tools for data collection and, basically proficient in data warehousing and querying tools, statistical scripting/programming languages and libraries, data mining, dashboarding/visualization .', ' Manage team for data driven analysis and metric reporting with responsibilities including data collection, reporting development, and analytics execution.', ' Apart from the technical skills, the candidate should have strong analytical skills, be able to analyze data and interpret .', 'Education', ' Advanced Degree']

['Location: San Jose', '', 'Ph.D. or MS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field.Minimum 3 years of experience with constraint satisfaction problems and nonlinear optimization methods.\xa0\xa0Strong experience in graph algorithms, such as graph partitioning, graph search, and graph mining.\xa0Strong proficiency in SW programming Python/NumPy and C++Experience with modern deep learning models and kernels is a big plus.\xa0', 'Design advanced algorithms to optimize hardware resource management and timing scheduling on a highly parallel architecture', 'Design a backend system that incorporates and maps ML representations, graphs and distributed programs onto a hardware resource model.', 'Excellent research and problem-solving capabilities in a deadline-driven technology world.\xa0', 'EEO Employer: SiMa is an equal opportunity employer; all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, Veteran status, or any other protected classification', 'Ph.D. or MS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field.', 'Areas of focus: deep learning, ML backend development on a constrained reconfigurable architecture', 'You will work as a member of the compiler team with a focus on the development of advanced scheduling, placement, routing and constraint satisfaction algorithms for a highly parallel ML architecture. You will work with the frontend compiler, HW and simulation engineers to improve performance and power solutions by suggesting and implementing HW/SW features.', 'AI2006', 'SiMa.ai is a machine learning company enabling high performance compute at the lowest power. Founded by industry veterans, the company has raised more than $40M in funding with strong investor backing. We are hiring hardware, software, and systems architects to help innovate and build the industry’s first Machine Learning SoC (MLSoC), a heterogeneous compute platform that simultaneously supports traditional compute with an ML environment, providing a seamless software experience for our customers.\xa0', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Strong proficiency in SW programming Python/NumPy and C++', "Depending on the candidate's background, there is a lot of room for growth and expansion. Responsibilities include but not limited to the following:", 'Job Description', 'Your work will have a direct impact on our success. Read white paper by The Linley Group: Machine Learning Moves to the Edge to learn more.', 'Develop methods and methodologies to perform constraint placement and physical connectivity among ML kernels.', 'Experience with modern deep learning models and kernels is a big plus.\xa0', 'At SiMa.ai, we offer competitive compensation and best in class benefits. We are bold, creative, focused on execution, and looking for talent that wants to build breakthrough technology from the ground up. In addition to our medical and dental plans, we offer free at-work meals, support for health and wellness, and provide an environment that fosters learning and career growth.', 'We are bold, creative, focused on execution, and looking for talent that wants to build breakthrough technology from the ground up. Imagine your ideas implemented in production software and silicon.\xa0', 'Strong experience in graph algorithms, such as graph partitioning, graph search, and graph mining.\xa0', 'Machine Learning Moves to the Edge', '\xa0', 'Perks', 'Minimum 3 years of experience with constraint satisfaction problems and nonlinear optimization methods.\xa0\xa0', 'Design advanced algorithms to optimize hardware resource management and timing scheduling on a highly parallel architectureDevelop methods and methodologies to perform constraint placement and physical connectivity among ML kernels.Design a backend system that incorporates and maps ML representations, graphs and distributed programs onto a hardware resource model.Analyze and suggest improvements to the hardware architecture specifications.', 'Analyze and suggest improvements to the hardware architecture specifications.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Software Engineer-Backend Compiler\xa0']

['', 'Here’s the thing – large companies have a distinct need for help with their massive technology functions. Whether it’s SAP, a Java application, or SharePoint, these businesses require talent who can keep them up and running smoothly. If you have the breadth of knowledge it takes to work at the enterprise level, our client’s opening is waiting.', 'Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.', 'EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.', 'Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. ', ' EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.', 'Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).', '\ufeffSTUFF OUR LAWYERS WANT US TO SAY', 'ABOUT BRIDGEVIEW IT', 'Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)', 'Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.', 'You have a valuable set of skills, and it’s our job to make sure you get connected with the roles, companies, and career paths that help you realize your full potential. We don’t just forward you random job descriptions; we build a real relationship to get you wherever it is you want to go. We might be based in Denver, clearly the best city on earth, but we are connected to opportunities across America that will both challenge and fulfill you. Let’s do this. Apply for the above role, or sign up for job alerts at https://bridgeviewit.com/jobalerts.\xa0', 'HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT', 'See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in the tech stack. ', '\xa0', 'Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.', 'Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in the tech stack. Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', 'Do you remember when the first YouTube video was uploaded in 2005? We don’t, because we were too busy creating the best technology placement firm in the country. Back then, we saw how extreme the demand was for technologists. Companies needed help finding them, and technologists needed help sifting through the noise. That’s our specialty.', 'We are unable to sponsor H1B candidates at this time.\xa0Those authorized to work in the US without restriction are encouraged to apply. BridgeView IT is an equal opportunity employer.', 'Is your idea of the “big picture” more of a massive billboard than a framed 8 x 10 photo? We’re seeking a Senior Software Engineer who is ready to take control of large-scale programs and applications for one of our clients in Boston. ', 'Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.']

We design and implement efficient and scalable machine learning systems from data collection and training to deployment and real-time serving using Python We write and review code for productionizing machine learning models from the RESTful API specification to deployment automation. ['', 'At Mavenlink, we strive to create an inclusive workplace that upholds the dignity of all people. We value, respect, and celebrate everyone’s individualities and honor their unique strengths from all different walks of life. We believe that embracing the diversity of thought and perspective encourages collaboration that leads to product (and people!) innovation, diverse products and a successful business', 'You challenge the old trope of being a loner, you’re looking to be part of a team!\xa0It’s tough to grow and develop great ideas when you’re encased in the silo -you’re looking for a place to stretch.\xa0Maybe you’re sick of being used to only put out fires, or hate the idea of just being a maintenance engineer. Our culture defeats these by design!\xa0A great addition would bring:', 'An intentionally engaging culture - ditch the silo!Competitive pay and benefit optionsStrong work-life balance as a focus of the companyThe chance to learn from some of the best people in the business, including the company’s foundersA vibrant, collaborative and devoted team, who still makes time for funSnacks? Check. Drinks? Check. Game nights? Check!', 'An intentionally engaging culture - ditch the silo!', "5+ years of engineering production codeYou've been part of strengthening teams in the pastStack alignment isn’t a requirement, but you have the ability to learn and adapt to our tech stack:\xa0Ruby / React-Redux / GraphQL", 'Developing a rich & sophisticated React component architecture', 'Evolving from a single Rails app to cohesive, decoupled services', 'About the opportunity', 'Snacks? Check. Drinks? Check. Game nights? Check!', 'As a Senior Software Engineer at Mavenlink, you’ll be part of our hugely collaborative development team working on our core Mavenlink and integrations products..\xa0This team is unlike any you’ve seen as a developer - from the beginning, this team has been a beacon of collaboration for the company. Pair-programming, continuous learning, coaching and mentorships, full-stack development and weekly growth sessions are just a few of the ways we’ve created a one-of-a-kind culture for engineers where we’re actually hands-on instead of stuck in the silo!', 'Your Profile', 'Working for a successful smaller-size tech company is a lifestyle choice rather than a job choice.\xa0We believe every company can be successful with the right technology and that every individual can be with the right culture.\xa0We believe in collaboration - that working hand-in-hand brings the best thoughts to the table and creates an environment of learning and growth.\xa0Here, you’ll enjoy:', 'Mavenlink’s product is changing the entire services industry and engineering has a front-row seat.\xa0We’re not looking for more people to put out fires, we’re looking for more engineers to develop new features and provide thought leadership!\xa0Some of the things we’re working on together include:', "You've been part of strengthening teams in the past", 'Strong work-life balance as a focus of the company', 'The chance to learn from some of the best people in the business, including the company’s founders', 'Auto-scaled, self-healing production Kubernetes implementation', 'Did we mention that Mavenlink is an awesome place to work? You’ll have the opportunity to work in an energetic environment with a smart team that loves what they do.', "In addition to these interesting challenges, our Senior Engineers mentor, guide, and uplift the team through deep collaboration and expertise. You'll be an influencer - without the cringe", '5+ years of engineering production code', "Auto-scaled, self-healing production Kubernetes implementationDeveloping a rich & sophisticated React component architectureEvolving from a single Rails app to cohesive, decoupled servicesIn addition to these interesting challenges, our Senior Engineers mentor, guide, and uplift the team through deep collaboration and expertise. You'll be an influencer - without the cringe", 'Mavenlink is a rapidly growing, globally recognized SaaS company that provides technology, expertise, and support that enables organizations throughout the world to conduct business anywhere, with anyone. We believe every business deserves a chance to succeed in today’s fast-moving, connected economy. That’s why we set out to reinvent the way the world conducts business — and why we need people just like you.', 'Competitive pay and benefit options', 'Our Philosophy', 'Stack alignment isn’t a requirement, but you have the ability to learn and adapt to our tech stack:\xa0Ruby / React-Redux / GraphQL', 'www.mavenlink.com/about', 'Goals and Responsibilities', 'A vibrant, collaborative and devoted team, who still makes time for fun']

This portfolio of services has been developed organically across numerous continents from our several hundred projects a year. This global foundation of benchmarks and best practices is an integral part of our project methodology. For over forty years, we have centered our work and research on developing best practices and designing state of the art supply chains. This concentration has let us bridge the gap between consultants and engineers, allowing us to support our clients across the full project lifecycle: developing, engineering, and implementing solutions and initiatives. Because we provide both strategic solutions as well as implementations, our work in each is strengthened respectively.', 'We are proud to be one of the few consultancies listed in SupplyChainBrain\'s Top 100 Supply Chain Partners. This unique combination of strategic engagements and tactical engineering services across and within the supply chain has regularly resulted in over half of Gartner\'s list of "Top 25 Supply Chains" to rely on Miebach to support their supply chain initiatives.', 'Knowledge of business intelligence tools (Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, Alteryx, etc.)', 'Work directly with clients & internal teams to understand business requirements of a client organization, identify data requirements and necessary supporting analysis, and formulating strategies and solutions that yield value for our clients', 'Duties/Responsibilities', '\xa0', 'Build custom optimization models as well as visualizations and apps that can be integrated and deployed within the clients’ systems', 'Develop supply and distribution network strategies for client companies, evaluating cost, service, and flexibility. Determine optimal site location and inventory levels for facilities, determine ideal transportation lanes, and identify appropriate mix of transportation and contracting strategies', 'The Supply Chain Analyst works on teams designing best-in-class supply chain strategies utilizing state of the art optimization and data science tools. job_title: Software Engineer: Systems Testing and Automation
job_text: ['', 'simple', ', ', 'Professional experience in QA engineering', 'Development of regression analysis testing automation', 'We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer competitive health, dental, and vision benefits for employees and their dependents, a monthly gym reimbursement to support your physical health, and a commute or internet allowance to make your trips to your office or your desk easier. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. ', 'Triaging and fixing operating system issues impacting the reliability of product offerings', 'We want people who are passionate about designing and operating secure systems at scale.', 'Experience in developing test automation at scale', 'We value development', 'We value diversity and inclusivity. We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Collaborating with cloud operation and SRE teams to reduce fleet failures related to systems’ software stack', 'Experience writing secure, testable and robust code', 'Development of telemetry for fleet failure analysis', 'Basic skills with Python or C/C++ or similar experience', 'We support our remote employee experience', 'What We’ll Expect From You', 'Our Team: ', 'Our Stack: ', 'Have you ever wondered what happens inside the cloud?', 'our community', 'We value development. You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging ourselves to continuously grow. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship, LinkedIn Learning tracks, and other internal programs. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education.', 'Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for Systems’ software stack', 'Our Tools: ', ' We value development. You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging ourselves to continuously grow. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship, LinkedIn Learning tracks, and other internal programs. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education. We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer competitive health, dental, and vision benefits for employees and their dependents, a monthly gym reimbursement to support your physical health, and a commute or internet allowance to make your trips to your office or your desk easier. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match.  We support our remote employee experience. While we have great office spaces in NYC, Cambridge and Palo Alto, we’re very distributed—we use a number of communication tools to connect across the company—and all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams face-to-face at team offsites. We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office. We value diversity and inclusivity. We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. ['', 'Design, implement, and deploy thoughtful RESTful APIs', 'Experience building and maintaining back-end application infrastructures', 'Python,\xa0Node.js, Django (and any other language you may want to mention, the more you are familiar with the better)', 'Seamlessly incorporate the results of our data scientists research into our SAAS product', 'Work on a Scrum team in a collaborative environment to build a high-value, enterprise-grade SAAS product', 'Experience with building/maintaining distributed systems', '5+ years of experience in software developmentExcellent knowledge of modern software engineering practicesPython,\xa0Node.js, Django (and any other language you may want to mention, the more you are familiar with the better)Experience with building/maintaining distributed systemsExposure to multiple programing paradigms (just OO is fine, FP even better)Experience building and maintaining back-end application infrastructuresExperience with Git or other distributed version control systemsFamiliarity with AWS or similar cloud computing platforms', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Have a major impact in the professional growth and productivity levels of your teammates', "Evisort is on a mission to change how companies interact with their most important legal documents, their incoming and outgoing contracts. The company was founded in 2016 out of Harvard Law and MIT research to develop artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms to help companies rapidly and accurately mine contracts for data. Evisort's AI understands meaning and context in legal language, virtually eliminating the need to screen contracts. Evisort helps companies to organize, understand, and extract data from their contracts. With Evisort, information locked away in documents becomes searchable, and key contract terms and important dates can be surfaced to the right people at the right time to accelerate legal review, reduce costs/risks and improve business compliance.", 'Use your past experience to help instrument the backend with application and performance metrics to gain better visibility on the system', 'We are seeking a software engineer to join our team and help with scaling and expanding our already successful product on its way to revolutionizing how organizations process their legal data and operate around it.', 'Leverage AWS to help ensure stability and scalability of a rapidly growing product', "We are backed by some of the most prominent VC's with Microsoft being a leading investor in our last round of financing. Come join us and see what all the fuss is about.", '\ufeffBackground Requirements', '5+ years of experience in software development', 'Familiarity with AWS or similar cloud computing platforms', 'Excellent knowledge of modern software engineering practices', 'Exposure to multiple programing paradigms (just OO is fine, FP even better)', 'Senior Software Engineer ', 'Experience with Git or other distributed version control systems', "What You'll Do", 'Design, implement, and deploy thoughtful RESTful APIsSeamlessly incorporate the results of our data scientists research into our SAAS productLeverage AWS to help ensure stability and scalability of a rapidly growing productWork on a Scrum team in a collaborative environment to build a high-value, enterprise-grade SAAS productUse your past experience to help instrument the backend with application and performance metrics to gain better visibility on the systemHave a major impact in the professional growth and productivity levels of your teammates']

['', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth
