MBA orMaster in Science a plus", ' Maintains a working knowledge of new technologies, which may improve operations, and develops recommendations accordingly.', ' Five or more years Design Engineering/ Project management or Product Engineering in a high volume environment', ' Leadership experience or equivalent transferable experience a plus', ' Evaluates and engages in projects that would reduce hazardous waste and assists in the implementation of Environmental improvements. Such as, implementing and suggesting waste elimination initiatives specifically related to the function and department such as recycling opportunities and elimination of paper waste.', ' Written Communication – Writes technical documents clearly and accurately.Transfers technical data into meaningful written documents that can be understood by all levels of the organization.Writes comprehensive well developed policies and work instructions.Writes clear actions and audit reports.', ' Participation in professional organizations a plus', ' Manages and oversees the daily function of the Engineering Department', ' Ensure all people placed under their assigned area of responsibility, or all persons who may be affected by equipment or processes placed under their responsibility are complying with the rules and regulations set forth by Federal, Local and State government, and LISI Aerospace policies, procedures and plans.', ' Oral Communication - Speaks clearly and persuasively in positive or negative situations; listens intently to others and seeks clarification; Provides clear and pleasant responses to inquires regardless of the situation; Presents complex concepts in a simple manner to achieve understanding of benefit plans at all levels of the organization. Demonstrates group presentation skills; Participates in meetings.', ' Analytical - Synthesizes complex or diverse information; Collects and researches data; Uses experience to complement data; Designs work flows and procedures as necessary to implement new processes and enhance productivity in current processes.', ' Adaptability - Adapts to changes in the work environment; Manages competing demands; Changes approach or method to best fit the situation; Able to deal with frequent change, delays, or unexpected events.', ' Interfaces with internal and external customers to provide information on current projects and products.', ' Technical Skills – Understands and has working knowledge of Engineering software such as CAD/CAM, Solids Modeling, Simulated Structural Analysis, FEA,etc…, Understands principles, and techniques of forging, cold heading and machine screws.Must be able to design, create, and manage engineer projects, utilizing project management tools and techniques.', ' Analyzes technology trends, human resource needs, and market demand to plan projects.', ' Actively participates in LISI Aerospace Global Engineering committees and teams', " Team Work - Balances team and individual responsibilities; Coaches for improved performance, Identifies/ develops high potential employees, Conducts performance evaluations, Progressive Counseling and Recommends compensation increases within company guidelines.', ' Continually seek opportunities to improve our HSE performance by establishing objectives and targets, measuring progress, and reporting our results', ' Maintains a working knowledge of safety policies and regulations to ensure duties of self and others are performed in a safe manner.', ' Familiarity with aerospace quality standards such as TC20/SC4.', ' Planning/Organizing - Prioritizes and plans work activities of self and others; Uses time efficiently; Plans for resources in a creative way only adding cost as absolutely necessary; Sets goals and objectives; Organizes or schedules other people and their tasks; Develops realistic action plans.', ' Confers with management, production, R&D, and sales staff to determine engineering feasibility, cost effectiveness, and customer demand for new and existing products.', ' Manages, delegates, and plans the workload and achievement of tasks/deadlines', ' Leads and develops product engineers, manufacturing engineers, metallurgist and other associated employees.', ' Travel may be required (national and international) to solve and analyze customer requirements and/or product issues', ' Responsible for ensuring employees in assigned area are aware of their requirement to bring any known or suspected nonconformance for all company procedures or legal requirements to management’s attention immediately.', ' Responsible for and ensuring that all employees attend all training provided and for adhering to all HSE procedures, policies, and plans, conforming to reporting requirements, and safe operating procedures at all times.', ' Business Acumen - Understands business implications of decisions; Displays orientation to profitability; Demonstrates knowledge of market and competition; Aligns work with strategic goals.', ' Resolves engineering related problems using new techniques, technologies, or concepts.', ' Oversees the action plan for each area and is ultimately responsible for ensuring deadlines and commitment to internal and external customers are met', ' Forecasts operating costs of department and provides necessary information for budget requests.', ' Professionalism - Approaches others in a tactful manner; Reacts well under pressure; Treats others with respect and consideration regardless of their status or position; Accepts responsibility for own actions; Follows through on commitments.', ' Provides timely communication to management and internal/external customers on developments, which may affect profit, schedule, costs, customer relations, and/or inter-departmental relations.']

If you fit our qualifications and culture, please connect with us and let’s get started.', 'Comfortable working with various quality management systems', 'Must possess valid US Driver’s License', 'Competitive wages with incentive compensation', 'We are innovative and naturally curious individuals who love applying science to tough problems.We work as a team, from a foundation of mutual trust, humility, and integrity.We thrive on creating solutions, solving problems, and succeeding for our clients.We create a fun, safe, and collaborative environment for all to enjoy.We support each other with understanding and compassion through life’s difficult moments.We believe in doing what’s right, even when it’s not always easy.We are committed to excellence and keep our promises to deliver superior solutions on time and within budget.', 'Experience with embedded communication protocols including I2C, SPI, UART, CAN and USB', '\ufeff', 'Experience with closed-loop motor control algorithms and PID tuning', 'Long-term relationships and enduring partnerships', 'Embedded Software Engineer in Oregon or Washington']

['', 'Intrigued? Let’s look at what a successful career at Resource Data might look like.', 'Keywords: Python, R, Dplyr, GLM, Caret, Keras, Tidymodels, Pandas, statsmodels, scikit-learn, REST API, data visualization, AWS, SageMaker, Azure Synapse, HDInsight, Data Factory, Data Lakes, Rekognition, Jupyter Notebook, Microsoft Power BI, Talend, Tableau', 'You’ve identified datasets that look intriguing. You’re comfortable working directly with the client and have started discussing how they might use them for better insights.', 'You’ve identified several other clients in the local area in need of data analytics services. You have worked with the proposal team to develop technical estimates and present proposals. New clients are coming on board.', 'You’ve identified several other clients in the local area in need of data analytics services. You have worked with the proposal team to develop technical estimates and present proposals. New clients are coming on board.You’re able to market the breadth of services Resource Data can offer and are expanding our presence with clients outside of data analytics.You’re working with the hiring team to identify colleges and programs that provide the right mix of technical and analytical education so you can help hire the best candidates for a growing practice.', 'You’re able to market the breadth of services Resource Data can offer and are expanding our presence with clients outside of data analytics.', 'Resource Data has been in the business of providing custom software and data-driven business applications for over 30 years. We’ve built a reputation of being trustworthy, competent, and dependable. Clients rely on us to help them effectively use technology to improve their business. We don’t just give them buzzwords and jargon; we provide practical advice based on our technical expertise and inside knowledge of their business. Data analysis tools and insight are a growing part of our services.', 'If this sounds like the right place for you to continue you’re career journey, send us an application. We’d love to talk more about this opportunity and what Resource Data can offer.', 'You’ve had a role in several other projects building ETL processes and expanding data warehouse capabilities. This has allowed you to build connections across the Resource Data offices.', 'Starting in Alaska over 30 years ago, Resource Data has grown to over 180 professionals across 5 offices. We’re ready and eager to demonstrate high value results to local clients through our commitment to people, technology, and results.', 'You’ve started working with the business users to understand what they’re after and how you can help.', 'You’ve continued to build your network at Resource Data and leverage expertise from across the company. You appreciate the depth of technical knowledge and the diversity of skills available to assist on specific problems.', 'You jumped right in. After a period of acclimation with your new teammates, you started work on an existing data analytics project, helping the team complete key objectives on time.', 'Technology is the tool, data the medium, and insights the art.', 'You’ve started working with the client on a new initiative. You’re leading the research and developing a proof-of-concept to validate the idea and turn it into a full project.You have identified work that could be handed off to someone more junior. We’ve started hiring for a new position.You’ve continued to build your network at Resource Data and leverage expertise from across the company. You appreciate the depth of technical knowledge and the diversity of skills available to assist on specific problems.You’ve led an internal discussion about common tools used in data analytics and the problem sets they are applied to. This has led to requests from other branches to support developing data analytics practice areas.', 'Resource Data is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Unfortunately, we are not able to provide any visa sponsorship or transfers for this position.', 'After three months here…', 'We expect you’ve got a few years’ experience in a business setting applying your statistical and machine learning background using tools like R and Python. In addition to data manipulation and modeling, you should have some exposure to software development and technical projects. Ultimately, we’re more interested in what you’ve done than years of experience, so please feel free to highlight your accomplishments.', 'This is just year one. Imagine what you can accomplish after that!', 'After one year, you’re building Resource Data and have a vision of a data analytics team.', 'You’ve led an internal discussion about common tools used in data analytics and the problem sets they are applied to. This has led to requests from other branches to support developing data analytics practice areas.', 'We often say Resource Data is consulting done right. We work hard to provide stability and flexibility so that our employees can grow and experience long-term successful careers here. We take our commitment to clients seriously and strive to do our best work for them while also having a rewarding personal life.', 'You’re working with the hiring team to identify colleges and programs that provide the right mix of technical and analytical education so you can help hire the best candidates for a growing practice.', 'Three months in and you’re a bona fide member of the Resource Data team. The client sees Resource Data as their data analytics experts.', 'At six months you’re developing opportunities.', 'You jumped right in. After a period of acclimation with your new teammates, you started work on an existing data analytics project, helping the team complete key objectives on time.You’ve had a role in several other projects building ETL processes and expanding data warehouse capabilities. This has allowed you to build connections across the Resource Data offices.You’ve started working with the business users to understand what they’re after and how you can help.You’ve identified datasets that look intriguing. You’re comfortable working directly with the client and have started discussing how they might use them for better insights.Three months in and you’re a bona fide member of the Resource Data team. The client sees Resource Data as their data analytics experts.', 'You’ve started working with the client on a new initiative. You’re leading the research and developing a proof-of-concept to validate the idea and turn it into a full project.', 'Sound a little pretentious? Maybe, but as a data analytics professional you know that providing data-driven insights can make an impact. That’s why you got into this field! Now, you’d like to do it not just for one company, but for many. Read on to find out how!', 'You have identified work that could be handed off to someone more junior. We’ve started hiring for a new position.']

['Hot Market: With the proliferation of cloud applications and the increasing need to have a data-driven business, finding an integration technology is top of mind for many companies. According to industry analysts, the Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) market grew by 70% in 2017, making it the fastest growth area in the application infrastructure and middleware market.', 'As a Senior/Principal Software Engineer, you will have a prominent role within the team that is responsible for two products - SnapLogic eXtreme (which helps our customers build spark based data pipelines in public clouds like AWS and Azure) and Snaplogic ELT (which enables our customers to create visual data transformations in cloud data warehouses like Snowflake and RedShift).We are seeking a detail-oriented candidate with outstanding technical abilities and accomplishments, a strong passion for technology and software craftsmanship, and the willingness to go the extra mile for our customers.\xa0', 'Hot Market', 'AI-fueled Product Innovation: SnapLogic’s modern, self-service and cloud-native platform makes integration fast and easy for IT and business managers alike. Earlier this year, SnapLogic celebrated the one-year anniversary of its industry-first artificial intelligence technology, known as Iris AI, which is paving the way for autonomous integration with exciting innovations set to be released over the next 2-3 years.', 'You appreciate the level of code quality required for delivering and maintaining successful enterprise products and you always write code with testability in mind.', 'You have experience building and debugging complex SQL queries.', 'Cycle between projects in weeks rather than years, while working closely with customers to harden an early stage product as it achieves product market fit.', 'You have a pragmatic and customer-centric view of products and processes.', 'Company Momentum', 'What We’re Looking For:', 'Keep on top of emerging trends and technologies\xa0 in the field of cloud technologies and distributed data processing, including open source products.', 'Industry Recognition', 'You have excellent communication skills, are comfortable working with little supervision, and have a preference for taking initiative.', 'You have experience with batch, stream processing using Java, Scala, Spark in a cloud environment (AWS, Azure, GCP, DataBricks, etc.)', 'Happy Customers', "Company Momentum: SnapLogic consistently sees impressive bookings growth year-over-year, recently adding global customers like Emirates, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, PwC, Schneider Electric, Thomson Reuters, and Workday. Driven by the industry's best and brightest employees in offices across North America, the UK, and India, plus a solid network of industry partners, SnapLogic receives regular recognition from analysts and industry experts.", 'Happy Customers: Our customers see unmatched results with the SnapLogic platform. Adobe enables 800+ “citizen integrators” and saves millions per year. AstraZeneca enables 600+ self-service users globally on a single platform. Box connected 24 + apps in months with only 1.5 developers. SnapLogic’s customer retention rate is over 95%, and analysts recognize SnapLogic as an industry leader in customer satisfaction.', 'The Role:', 'You have experience and expertise with various public cloud technologies and concepts (EC2, EMR, S3, Cloudwatch, SNS, VPC, IAM roles, WASB, ADLS, Databricks etc.)', 'Vibrant Company Culture', 'You have a good understanding of ANSI SQL specifications.', 'AI-fueled Product Innovation', 'Industry Recognition: Industry experts have consistently recognized our company, products, customers and employees as best-in-class. Earlier this year, Gartner recognized SnapLogic as a Leader for the fourth straight year in its\xa0Magic Quadrant for Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS); CRN Magazine picked SnapLogic as a top innovator in their\xa02018 Big Data 100 List, and DBTA Magazine named SnapLogic among the\xa0Top 100 Companies That Matter Most in Data.', 'You have deep experience with Java in a multithreaded environment, with a complete understanding of object-oriented programming and software complexity.', 'Vibrant Company Culture: We firmly believe that our people are our strongest asset as a company and we never lose sight of that belief. Our work environment, company programs and employee services are all geared to ensure our employees have challenging and meaningful roles along with a great place to do their best work. Our efforts to keep our culture thriving and strong are paying off: for two years’ running, we have been named a\xa0Bay Area Top Workplace\xa0and Mogul recently selected SnapLogic for their list of the\xa0Top 100 Companies for Millenial Women.', 'To all recruitment agencies: SnapLogic does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to SnapLogic employees or to any other company location. SnapLogic is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with the company. SnapLogic provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. SnapLogic complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. SnapLogic expressly prohibits any form of unlawful employee harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of SnapLogic employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.', "Bachelor's or Master’ degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.", 'Contribute to the on-going development of SnapLogic Extreme and Snaplogic ELT', 'Experience working with Cloud Data Warehouse Architectures (Redshift, Snowflake, BigQuery, Azure Synapse etc.)', 'Experience with Database query optimization.', 'Why Join Now:', 'Be able to quickly debug complex issues in code and figure out the root cause, using tests (unit and integration) to validate the work.', 'You have experience developing and deploying containerized microservices in public clouds like AWS/Azure.', 'Contributions to open source projects like Spark, Hadoop, Flink, etc.', "You have deep experience with Java in a multithreaded environment, with a complete understanding of object-oriented programming and software complexity.You have experience building and delivering enterprise SaaS software at scale in public cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)You have experience developing and deploying containerized microservices in public clouds like AWS/Azure.You have experience with batch, stream processing using Java, Scala, Spark in a cloud environment (AWS, Azure, GCP, DataBricks, etc.)You have experience and expertise with various public cloud technologies and concepts (EC2, EMR, S3, Cloudwatch, SNS, VPC, IAM roles, WASB, ADLS, Databricks etc.)You have experience building and debugging complex SQL queries.You have a good understanding of ANSI SQL specifications.You have experience collaborating with other stakeholders like product management and QA to deliver features in an agile development environment.You appreciate the level of code quality required for delivering and maintaining successful enterprise products and you always write code with testability in mind.You have excellent communication skills, are comfortable working with little supervision, and have a preference for taking initiative.You have a pragmatic and customer-centric view of products and processes.Bachelor's or Master’ degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.", 'Knowledge of Spark internals.', 'Interest in AI/ML technologies like MLlib, Scikit, tensorflow etc.', 'Nice to have:', 'SnapLogic is seeking Principal/Senior Software Engineers (Java & Cloud Technologies) for our Big Data Engineering team in San Mateo, California.', 'Contribute to the on-going development of SnapLogic Extreme and Snaplogic ELTBe able to quickly debug complex issues in code and figure out the root cause, using tests (unit and integration) to validate the work.Cycle between projects in ['', 'Your Purpose', 'Your Team', 'At Bresslergroup, we are a motivated lot of thinkers, makers, and problem solvers. We challenge and inspire each other every day. We are curious, clever, and confident, and we look for the same in those we work with. Our work is driven by discovering insights into how our users interact with products in the real world, and our solutions are focused on seamlessly blending digital and physical layers of the experience. With six disciplines under one roof, we work in multidisciplinary teams whose combined research, creative, and technical expertise add value throughout a collaborative product-development process. This is how we remain reliably innovative. ', 'Are you an embedded software engineer looking for a new challenge? Bresslergroup is looking for a talented software engineer to provide embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer products and medical devices.\xa0 ', 'Functional test and debug using lab equipment such as oscilloscopes, multimeters, spectrum analyzers and signal generators ', 'As an Embedded Software Engineer, you will work alongside electrical engineers, designers, and researchers in a dynamic development environment. You will participate in the daily activities of the Electrical and Software Engineering teams, to create meaningful solutions to challenging product design problems. You will participate in the specification and design of medical devices, consumer products, and commercial products by taking an active role in ideation, architecture, component selection and software and firmware development. Your energy and enthusiasm drives our Electrical and Software Engineering teams continue to grow and improve their capabilities ', 'Participate in the development of hardware drivers for peripherals, such as sensors, short and long range wireless modems, and more. ', ' ', 'More About You', '\xa0 ', 'Your Purpose ', 'You are confident in your technical skills, and your ability to add value to high profile and mission critical product design challenges. You are comfortable with client-facing activities and have great interpersonal skills. You have excellent writing and presentation skills – both used frequently for client presentations and in-person meetings. You are comfortable with ambiguity and complexity, because sometimes that leads to the most unique, unexpected design solutions. You want to work in an environment where things move quickly, and you’re happy to adapt as a project evolves. You can work on-site in our Philadelphia office, and you are willing to travel occasionally. You are confident that you will be a trusted peer to your colleagues, and a valuable asset to Bresslergroup. ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Your Team ', 'You like to explore new territories and to learn from others. You are passionate about emerging technology in product design and electrical engineering and interested in new ways of designing every day things. You can successfully lead clients through the full product development process, from brainstorming and conception, through testing, tooling, and production. You have a keen understanding of electrical and software engineering tools and methods and strive to find ways to improve them. ', 'Embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer, industrial, and medical devices ', 'Key Responsibilities ', 'More About You ', 'You are confident.', 'You are confident. ', '\xa0', 'You are clever. ', 'Software project architecture, design, development, verification and project management ', 'You are curious. ', 'Please send your resume and portfolio to career@bresslergroup.com!', 'Are you an embedded software engineer looking for a new challenge? Bresslergroup is looking for a talented software engineer to provide embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer products and medical devices.\xa0', 'Work closely with electrical engineers and interaction designers to gracefully resolve technical roadblocks and contribute to broad problem solving and design efforts. ', 'Embedded systems programming in C, C++, assembly, and software support using C#, Python, and Java. ', 'You have a passion for embedded software and firmware development, and your past work experience and side projects strongly demonstrate this passion. You are highly skilled in designing system architecture, IP selection, requirements specification, and low-level embedded firmware development. You are proficient in C and C++ for embedded development, proficient in Python for rapid prototyping, and proficient in C# or Java for development of test and other general-purpose software. You can apply your systems engineering knowledge to the design of consumer, commercial, industrial, and medical device products. You are familiar with prototype design, low-level debugging, requirements management, verification, traceability, system documentation, and failure analysis. ', 'You have at least a bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or Engineering, Robotics, or some other related discipline. Advanced degrees are a plus but not mandatory. You have at least 2 years of experience working in software and preferably firmware development. Ideally, you have worked in a consulting environment for at least 2 years and are familiar with the way such firms operate. You have familiarity with various certification bodies for the devices you develop – FCC, CE, IEC, and others. You have experience working in multidisciplinary teams, and an understanding of what those disciplines do and how it affects your work and the project.\xa0 ']

This position will utilize modern systems engineering practices to develop and evolve our energy management platforms. As MISO’s Systems Engineer, you will:', 'Transformative innovation is happening in the electric industry; from digitalizing homes and distributed resources, to renewable energy and an ever-changing grid. MISO manages the electricity superhighway in the Central U.S. and through use of groundbreaking research and advanced technology, our highly skilled employees ensure power flows reliably to 42 million Americans. Operating the electricity grid, running a robust energy market, planning for a bright future – it’s what our immensely talented and dedicated team does every day.\xa0', job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Backend – Member Experience
job_text: ['', 'Make an Impact', 'BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. In lieu of degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable.', 'Employee Stock Purchase Plan', 'Why Join Livongo?', 'Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office)', 'Generous PTO policy', 'Our Work Truly Matters', '7+ years’ experience in software engineering in a functional object-oriented language (Scala preferred, Java or Python).', 'As a senior member of the Member Experience Backend team, you will lead building the backend microservices to power our consumer facing applications across mobile, web, and smart health devices.', '10 paid holidays each year', ' Competitive compensation packages Comprehensive medical, dental, vision and 401K Generous PTO policy 10 paid holidays each year Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office) An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity Employee Stock Purchase Plan Employee Referral Bonus Program Team events and social gatherings Pet-friendly environment in Mountain View, CA and Denver Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families ', 'Diversity and Inclusion', 'Experience implementing REST APIs and highly scalable systems. Experience with event-driven architecture in a Microservices environment is a plus.', 'Best Places to Work', ' As a senior member of the Member Experience Backend team, you will lead building the backend microservices to power our consumer facing applications across mobile, web, and smart health devices. Partner with product managers, user experience designers, mobile and web front end engineers, and data scientists to support the full product lifecycle. Take ownership of our cloud APIs and services that connect biometric and clinical data across multiple health platforms, allow doctors and coaches to provide patient care via seamless access to Livongo, and deliver data-science powered care and advice to users. Lead projects for the team including grooming and sizing requirements, designing solutions, defining project plans and go to market strategy, and mentoring and coaching junior engineers. Harness state of the art technologies such as Scala, AWS, Play, gRPC, Protobuf, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, Microservices, MySQL, ElasticSearch, Flyway, FHIR, OAuth. ', 'What makes a Senior Software Engineer at Livongo different?', 'Team events and social gatherings', 'Lead projects for the team including grooming and sizing requirements, designing solutions, defining project plans and go to market strategy, and mentoring and coaching junior engineers.', 'Partner with product managers, user experience designers, mobile and web front end engineers, and data scientists to support the full product lifecycle.', 'Candidate Profile', ' BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. In lieu of degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable. 7+ years’ experience in software engineering in a functional object-oriented language (Scala preferred, Java or Python). 3+ years’ experience developing API services for consumer mobile and/or web applications or enterprise SaaS. Experience implementing REST APIs and highly scalable systems. Experience with event-driven architecture in a Microservices environment is a plus. Experience designing and optimizing relational databases, such as MySQL. Experience with ETL or AWS Redshift a plus. Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment. Strong written and verbal communication skills. ', 'Our Benefits Include', 'Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills.', 'Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families', 'Focus on PEOPLE', 'Pet-friendly environment in Mountain View, CA and Denver', 'Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment.', 'The Opportunity', '3+ years’ experience developing API services for consumer mobile and/or web applications or enterprise SaaS.', 'Take ownership of our cloud APIs and services that connect biometric and clinical data across multiple health platforms, allow doctors and coaches to provide patient care via seamless access to Livongo, and deliver data-science powered care and advice to users.', 'Employee Referral Bonus Program', 'Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement', 'Experience designing and optimizing relational databases, such as MySQL. Experience with ETL or AWS Redshift a plus.', 'Harness state of the art technologies such as Scala, AWS, Play, gRPC, Protobuf, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, Microservices, MySQL, ElasticSearch, Flyway, FHIR, OAuth.', 'Competitive compensation packages', 'Growth and Innovation', 'Comprehensive medical, dental, vision and 401K', 'An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity']

job_title: Senior Technical Lead Software Engineer (100% REMOTE)
job_text: ['Location: Remote with occasional travel to Santa Ana, CA and Detroit, MI ', 'Enthusiastic attitude with the drive to continually learn and improve.', "This role is a hands-on development role with the ability to lead the work of others.Expert knowledge and minimum 7 years of hands on experience in .Net, C#, SQL, JavaScriptExpert knowledge and understanding of computer systems architecture and design, computer industry trends and project management.Extensive knowledge of cloud technologies and hands-on experience with AWS including software-defined infrastructure / infrastructure as a code.Strong knowledge of OOAD and multi-tier architectures, including MVC/MVP/MVVM design patterns.Strong knowledge of web services, WCF, REST, and SOA Architecture.Strong knowledge of MVC GUI design including the ability to incorporate JQuery, JavaScript and CSS, plus expertise with AJAX/SPA; in-depth understanding of modern JavaScript frameworks such as REACTDeep knowledge of relational databases such as SQL Server. Strong analytical, problem solving, and planning skills.Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment.Team player who is flexible, delivery-oriented, and takes responsibility for the team's success.Enthusiastic attitude with the drive to continually learn and improve.Demonstrated leadership abilities. Minimum 3 years of experience in leading offshore technical teams of 5+ individual contributors.", 'Our client, a global leader in the healthcare and clinical system marketplace, is looking for a Senior Technical Lead Software Engineer (100% REMOTE) to help them continue to scale their growing engineering and development efforts. The ideal candidate will be familiar with the full software design life cycle and have proven experience leading a team from design overview all the way to production and implementation. You should have experience in designing, coding, testing and consistently managing applications and be extremely proficient coding in a Microsoft heavy environment (C#, .Net, .NET Core), experience with AWS, and have a strong understanding of system architecture and design.\xa0Candidates must also have a proven record of providing leadership to an offshore team of 5 or more.', 'Strong analytical, problem solving, and planning skills.', 'Strong knowledge of OOAD and multi-tier architectures, including MVC/MVP/MVVM design patterns.', 'Strong knowledge of web services, WCF, REST, and SOA Architecture.', 'This role is a hands-on development role with the ability to lead the work of others.', 'Strong knowledge of MVC GUI design including the ability to incorporate JQuery, JavaScript and CSS, plus expertise with AJAX/SPA; in-depth understanding of modern JavaScript frameworks such as REACT', "Team player who is flexible, delivery-oriented, and takes responsibility for the team's success.", 'Requirements:', 'Senior Technical Lead Software Engineer (100% REMOTE)', 'Extensive knowledge of cloud technologies and hands-on experience with AWS including software-defined infrastructure / infrastructure as a code.', 'Demonstrated leadership abilities. Minimum 3 years of experience in leading offshore technical teams of 5+ individual contributors.', 'offshore', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.', 'Expert knowledge and understanding of computer systems architecture and design, computer industry trends and project management.', 'Deep knowledge of relational databases such as SQL Server. ', '\xa0', 'You will be responsible for guiding and leading a remote team of engineers and developers on multiple different new and existing clinical platform products, clinical applications, and user portal systems with a healthy split between backend and front-end system design. 70% of the teams’ work will be focused on building new functionality and products with 30% of the time spent on support. ', 'Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment.', 'Expert knowledge and minimum 7 years of hands on experience in .Net, C#, SQL, JavaScript', 'Term: Direct Hire', 'Pay: $175-195k/yr. with 6% 401K match and 10% bonus', 'Position: Senior Technical Lead Software Engineer', 'Status: Must be able to work without sponsorship now OR in the future', 'Client: Confidential']

['', 'Experience with multithreading using native threads and or task', 'Team orientated', 'Express problems and solutions visually through white-boarding', 'Experience with SQL Server databases', 'Experience with the .Net 4.0 and 4.5 framework', 'Qualifications:', "5+ years' experience developing C# WinForms, Web-Services and Web ApplicationsExperience with multithreading using native threads and or taskKnowledge of MVCExperience with the .Net 4.0 and 4.5 framework5+ years' experience with database access methods/frameworks such as ADO.NET, LINQ and Entity FrameworkExperience with SQL Server including stored procedures (T-SQL)Strong skills in problem solving and debuggingExposure to Jira, Confluence or similar systemsTeam orientatedAttention to detailPassionate about building great softwareOther skills considered a plus:Familiarity with Medical and Rx claims processingC# extended stored procedures", 'Manage source code versioning and deployments', 'Essential Functions:', 'Specific Skills/Attributes:', 'Create and maintain technical documentation', 'Job Summary:', 'Strong skills in problem solving and debugging', 'Familiarity with Medical and Rx claims processing', 'Knowledge of MVC', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field preferred", 'Serve as a mentor to less experienced software engineers', 'This position is for a C# Software Engineer with full-stack experience developing Microsoft WinForms, Web, Web-Services, and Windows Service Applications. job_title: Data Center Electrical Protection and Controls Systems Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Provide technical support for product development and Project Managers in resolving all of Google electrical platforms design and technical issues.', 'Knowledgeable in the compliance requirements of the pertinent codes, regulations, and standards.', 'Responsibilities', '7 years of experience in design, programming, and operation of mission critical facilities with an emphasis on electrical system controls and integration.', '10 years of experience in the design, programming, and operation of mission critical facilities with an emphasis on electrical system controls and integration.', 'Working knowledge of various systems and equipment including protective relays, breaker trip units, network switches, data concentrators, HMI software packages, power quality meters, and Modbus and 61850 GOOSE/MMS protocols.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'New York, NY, USA; Austell, GA, USA; Council Bluffs, IA, USA; Clarksville, TN, USA; New Albany, OH, USA; Midlothian, TX, USA; The Dalles, OR 97058, USA; Reston, VA, USA; Henderson, NV, USA; Pryor, OK 74361, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Bridgeport, AL 35740, USA', 'About The Job', 'Fundamental understanding of data center and utility related infrastructure systems. ', 'Coordinate with internal and external interfaces to define high level control and monitoring architecture that will enable multiple data collectors to multiple stakeholders in various protocols.', 'Debug, modify, or write code for subroutines and use PLC logic to upgrade or restore to operation complex power systems controlled by ethernet protection networks.', " Bachelor's degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience. 7 years of experience in design, programming, and operation of mission critical facilities with an emphasis on electrical system controls and integration. ", 'Experience in design, operational, and commissioning of mission critical mechanical, electrical, and life safety systems.', " Master's degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience. 10 years of experience in the design, programming, and operation of mission critical facilities with an emphasis on electrical system controls and integration. Experience in design, operational, and commissioning of mission critical mechanical, electrical, and life safety systems. Working knowledge of various systems and equipment including protective relays, breaker trip units, network switches, data concentrators, HMI software packages, power quality meters, and Modbus and 61850 GOOSE/MMS protocols. Fundamental understanding of data center and utility related infrastructure systems.  Knowledgeable in the compliance requirements of the pertinent codes, regulations, and standards. ", "Bachelor's degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience.", 'Provide technical protocols and processes to manage and organize all of the critical field system operational data and provide critical data related to PUE, trends, and management summaries at a regular interval.', 'Provide technical support for power monitoring and control systems based on the IEC-61850 protocol and advocate engineering standards for complex controls system programming, commissioning, documentation, turn-up, and facilities turnover.', ' Provide technical support for power monitoring and control systems based on the IEC-61850 protocol and advocate engineering standards for complex controls system programming, commissioning, documentation, turn-up, and facilities turnover. Debug, modify, or write code for subroutines and use PLC logic to upgrade or restore to operation complex power systems controlled by ethernet protection networks. Provide technical support for product development and Project Managers in resolving all of Google electrical platforms design and technical issues. Coordinate with internal and external interfaces to define high level control and monitoring architecture that will enable multiple data collectors to multiple stakeholders in various protocols. Provide technical protocols and processes to manage and organize all of the critical field system operational data and provide critical data related to PUE, trends, and management summaries at a regular interval. ', "Master's degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience.", 'Preferred Qualifications']

', 'Experience with software engineering practices and technologies like system design, unit testing, and version control. ', 'Gain a deep understanding of Shipt’s operational problems and the data available / required to solve them.', 'Experience with a data visualization tool (Tableau, Chartio, Looker, Spotfire, Power BI, etc).', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Demonstrated high degree of proficiency in Python.', 'Nice to Haves', 'Collaborate with external teams to build dashboards and self-service tools to empower people to use data to make decisions. ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer- Big Data Technologies
job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Proven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3', 'Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', ' Amazon Aurora ', 'Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.']

Strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows. Expertise in object-oriented and/or functional programming languages (e.g. Python, Java/Scala). ", 'Supply reusable backend abstractions to ingest or access data sets (batch or low latency APIs).', ' Optimize the end-to-end workflow of data users at Slack (from crafting libraries to providing abstractions used to define jobs, schedule data pipelines or access data assets). ', 'What You Should Have', '5+ years of experience working with Big Data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, etc).', 'Strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows.', 'Deep understanding of polyglot data persistence (relational, key/value, document, column, graph).', 'Optimize the end-to-end workflow of data users at Slack (from crafting libraries to providing abstractions used to define jobs, schedule data pipelines or access data assets).', 'Streamline the creation of new data sets with accessible frameworks and Domain Specific Languages (DSL).', 'Improve the data quality and reliability of the pipelines (monitoring and failure detection).']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. ['', 'About VaST: Founded in 1999, VaST is headquartered in Warrenton, Virginia. VaST is 100% employee owned through our Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) with employees supporting clients around the globe. Our highest priorities are providing top-tier support to our clients while maintaining an employee first culture. Through this, VaST has earned the highest reputation of quality support as we are continually relied upon to solve the most difficult engineering problems for our clients. Our employees enjoy some of the most flexible and valuable compensation packages in the industry along with the long-term investment that comes from company ownership. Through our ESOP program, employees are provided ownership through annual contributions made by the employer. At VaST, being an employee owner means having a stable present while building your future.', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Self-motivated and eager to work intently to satisfy mission requirements', 'For more information about VaST, visit our website at www.VaST-inc.com.', 'Position Description: We are seeking software engineers that possess a mix of talent areas related to full-stack development. Our ideal candidate would possess a broad range of skills as our scope of work spans various technologies. A couple of the current technologies we are using to support our customers are Java, Python, Javascript, Angular, React and ElasticSearch. VaST encourages independent problem solving but also provide deep reach back support and a collaborative environment for our engineering team. We want motivated people who have experience with developing and are not afraid to adapt to the right architecture, languages, and libraries to build the best systems for the mission and deliver the best user experience.\xa0\xa0', 'Two (2) or more years with some combination of the following: Java, Javascript/Typescript, Python, Angular, ELK stack, Redis, Web Services (REST), Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Android development, NoSQL and SQL databases, Xmidas, Digital Signal Processing', 'Position Summary:', 'www.VaST-inc.com', 'Eligibility for TS/SCI clearance with Polygraph (U.S. citizenship required)', 'Adaptable and desire to maintain our VaST culture', '\xa0', 'Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field', 'Eligibility for TS/SCI clearance with Polygraph (U.S. citizenship required)Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related fieldSelf-motivated and eager to work intently to satisfy mission requirementsAdaptable and desire to maintain our VaST cultureTwo (2) or more years with some combination of the following: Java, Javascript/Typescript, Python, Angular, ELK stack, Redis, Web Services (REST), Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Android development, NoSQL and SQL databases, Xmidas, Digital Signal Processing', 'Position Description: ', 'Position Summary: VaST is seeking qualified candidates to fill our Software Engineer positions that include full stack development.', 'About VaST: ', 'Virginia Systems & Technology Inc. is proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class', 'For more information about VaST']

['', '.Net exposure', 'A client in the Portland, Oregon area is looking for a BI Developer to join their team! This is a full time role with benefits including: medical, dental, and vision. This is a brand new role for the organization and you will be making a large impact developing a reporting tool to implment an ERP. In this role you will be working on a team of two developers and a business analyst. As a BI Developer you will be working on a project focused on bringing this company’s ERP data on-site and building out a data warehouse. As a BI Engineer, you would be using MS SQL Server, postgresSQL, SSIS, SSRS, and ETL. In this role the data that you will be working with covers about 20 years of data and 130 tables. If you are looking to join a company where you can take ownership, work with a great team, and have a voice in solutions to make technology and the IT department better – this could be a great fit for you!', '4+ years of experience as a BI Developer/Engineer', 'Exposure to working at a medium sized company', 'Day-to-Day\xa0', 'postgresSQL experience', 'Desired Skills and Experience\xa0', 'Power BI/Tableu Experience', 'Process Improvement Experience', '2+ years of experience building a reporting solution, repository or data warehouse from the ground up', 'Plusses', '3+ years of experience with MS SQL Server 2012/2016: ETL, SSIS, SSRS']

job_text: ['', 'Deep understanding of core modern web concepts such as Single Page Apps and server side vs. client side rendering.', 'Qualifications:', 'Deep understanding of the “behind-the-scenes” of HTML rendering, CSS, and Javascript.', 'We are looking for an ambitious\xa0Senior Software Engineer. The ideal candidate is passionate about creating a seamless customer experience and is able to drive and execute end-to-end web-based customer journeys. You will plan, architect, build, and own our main external-facing web app using React.js, JavaScript, CSS, Relay and GraphQL. ', 'Responsibilities:', '7+ years of experience working as a Frontend or Fullstack Engineer.', 'B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience.7+ years of experience working as a Frontend or Fullstack Engineer.Experience with React.js and modern JavaScript libraries and tooling.Deep understanding of the “behind-the-scenes” of HTML rendering, CSS, and Javascript.Deep understanding of core modern web concepts such as Single Page Apps and server side vs. client side rendering.Familiarity with server-side technologies, preferably Node.js.Demonstrated design and UX sensibilities.', 'B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience.', 'Experience in Conversion Optimization and A/B testing, Web Performance Optimization, Relay, and GraphQL.', 'Mobile app development, particularly with React Native.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Experience with React.js and modern JavaScript libraries and tooling.', 'Mobile app development, particularly with React Native.Experience in Conversion Optimization and A/B testing, Web Performance Optimization, Relay, and GraphQL.Experience in the healthcare space and startup environments.', 'Bonus points for:', 'Develop new user-facing features.Build reusable code and libraries for future use.Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.', 'Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.', 'Build reusable code and libraries for future use.', ':', 'Demonstrated design and UX sensibilities.', 'About the role', 'Develop new user-facing features.', 'Familiarity with server-side technologies, preferably Node.js.', 'Experience in the healthcare space and startup environments.']

['', 'Fluency in Python and C++', 'Job Description & Skill Requirement', 'Email', '--', 'Lead Consulting', 'Additional Skills:', 'Please find an urgent requirement for a Full-time role. Please respond ASAP with your profile @\xa0vikash@radiansys.com\xa0\xa0', 'Good understanding of deep learning. The candidate does not need to build new DL models.', 'BSc/MSc in computer science, computer engineering, mathematics or equivalent.', 'Required Skills:', 'Experience developing complex software with low latency requirements', 'Experience working with specialized HW (CPU, GPU, ASIC, Embedded, etc.)\xa0', 'We are recruiting for a Software Engineer who has skills and experience in developing systems software and ML infrastructure. The candidate will be responsible for developing systems software that requires a good understanding of compilers, high-performance hardware, and deep learning. This software will measure the performance of Video workloads on special-purpose hardware (eg. GPU), it will identify performance bottlenecks and trace results to the non-performant components in the compiler and the ML model. The candidate will also assist in developing server-side software to deploy ML solutions for Video at scale. The ideal candidate will have good experience in building robust systems software and will have good knowledge of hardware and deep learning. ['', 'Familiarity with Unix/Linux environment highly recommended.', 'Duration: 12+ months (Contract to hire)', 'A solid computer science foundation including programming languages, operating systems, software engineering, and databases.', 'Job Title: Software Development Engineer-Java', "As client's unit, their brands help people stay informed and entertained, communicate and transact, while creating new ways for advertisers and partners to connect.", 'MS in Computer Science or a related field (or BS with 2 years of relevant experience).', 'Experience with scripting programming languages such as Python is a plus.', 'Remote till Covid restrictions- 6 to 18 months position,\xa0temp to perm.\xa0Set top Box/Advertising/B2B domain experience is preferred.Bachelors with 2 years of experience/Masters with 1 year experience in Java Development.Java, Spark, Pig, Hive, Scala, RestAPI.Building APIs.Java- solid experience.REST API/AWS or any Big Data/ETL Data manipulation experience.Hadoop is good to have-preferred.Java, Rest API & AWS (or Big Data technologies) are top 3 required skills.Multi-threading, Data Structures, Algorithms, debugging, troubleshooting good to have.Python is nice to have and preferred.', 'Multi-threading, Data Structures, Algorithms, debugging, troubleshooting good to have.', 'Python is nice to have and preferred.', 'B', "It takes powerful technology to connect client's brands and partners with an audience of 1 billion.Nearly half of client's employees are building the code and platforms that help us achieve that.Whether you’re looking to write mobile app code, engineer the servers behind their massive ad tech stacks, or develop algorithms to help us process 4 trillion data points a day, what you do here will have a huge impact on our business—and the world. Want in?As client's unit, their brands help people stay informed and entertained, communicate and transact, while creating new ways for advertisers and partners to connect.With technologies like XR, AI, machine-learning, and 5G, they’re transforming media for tomorrow, too.They're creators and coders, dreamers and doers creating what's next in content, advertising, and technology.", 'temp to perm.\xa0', 'Preferred:', 'Able to produce testable, modular, and efficient code in Java.', 'Hadoop is good to have-preferred.', '1+ years of experience in Java / J2EE including object-oriented design and design patterns, software architecture, multi-threading, and debugging skills.', 'Building APIs.', '1+ years of experience with big data technologies such as Hive, Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark, PIG etc.', 'Set top Box/Advertising/B2B domain experience is preferred.', 'Notes:', 'Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms.', 'Experience with Agile product development methodology is a plus.', "It takes powerful technology to connect client's brands and partners with an audience of 1 billion.", 'Bachelors with 2 years of experience/Masters with 1 year experience in Java Development.', "They're creators and coders, dreamers and doers creating what's next in content, advertising, and technology.", 'Strong verbal and written communication skills.', 'Java, Spark, Pig, Hive, Scala, RestAPI.', 'Experience with API design is a plus.', 'Remote till Covid restrictions- 6 to 18 months position,\xa0temp to perm.\xa0', 'Java- solid experience.', 'Good knowledge of SQL databases techniques.', 'Whether you’re looking to write mobile app code, engineer the servers behind their massive ad tech stacks, or develop algorithms to help us process 4 trillion data points a day, what you do here will have a huge impact on our business—and the world. Want in?', 'MS in Computer Science or a related field (or BS with 2 years of relevant experience).A solid computer science foundation including programming languages, operating systems, software engineering, and databases.1+ years of experience in Java / J2EE including object-oriented design and design patterns, software architecture, multi-threading, and debugging skills.1+ years of experience with big data technologies such as Hive, Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark, PIG etc.Able to produce testable, modular, and efficient code in Java.Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms.Good knowledge of SQL databases techniques.Ability to demonstrate great engineering practices.Strong verbal and written communication skills.', 'With technologies like XR, AI, machine-learning, and 5G, they’re transforming media for tomorrow, too.', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services is a plus.', 'Ability to demonstrate great engineering practices.', 'Minimum Qualifications:', "Nearly half of client's employees are building the code and platforms that help us achieve that.", 'REST API/AWS or any Big Data/ETL Data manipulation experience.', 'B2B or advertising experience is a plus.', 'Location: Dulles, VA', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services is a plus.Familiarity with Unix/Linux environment highly recommended.Experience with API design is a plus.Experience with large distributed systems, fault-tolerant system design, concurrency and high-performance software engineering preferred.Experience with Agile product development methodology is a plus.Experience with scripting programming languages such as Python is a plus.B2B or advertising experience is a plus.', 'Java, Rest API & AWS (or Big Data technologies) are top 3 required skills.', 'Experience with large distributed systems, fault-tolerant system design, concurrency and high-performance software engineering preferred.', 'Description:']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Rental Software Platform
job_text: ['About The Team', '', ' Ideally have 8+ years of experience or its equivalence in a software engineering role', ' Have a clear path to grow your career', ' Experienced and enjoy building reliable back end services with Java or other object oriented languages on the back end, as well as building UIs with modern tools like ES6, React, Redux, and Webpack on the front end.', ' Have self-awareness and strive to continually improve', ' Comfortable and confident when it comes to setting technical direction, performing code reviews, answering questions, and guiding more junior engineers', 'We follow a lightweight lean/Kanban methodology ', 'Everyone is expected to contribute their own ideas and understand the business ', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', 'About The Role', ' Have the ability to solve complex problems with practica l, maintainable, and scalable solutions', ' Work on initiatives that are among the highest priorities for Zillow Group', ' Collaborate with multiple teams across our consumer brands and corporate team', ' Responsible and supportive of team where possible, doing things big and small', 'We use Java on the back end and ES6, React, and Node on the front endEveryone is expected to contribute their own ideas and understand the business We deploy multiple times a dayWe follow a lightweight lean/Kanban methodology We learn from each other to improve our craft', 'We deploy multiple times a day', ' Use modern front end and back end development practices', ' Build products that genuinely affect the way people find a quality place to live', " Can empathize with the many different types of people who use Zillow Group's products", 'We use Java on the back end and ES6, React, and Node on the front end', ' Experienced architecting large systems', 'We learn from each other to improve our craft', ' Care about quality and testing', ' Have your ideas thoughtfully considered and potentially make it into a product']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Follow the full design life cycle process including participation in requirements specification, design activities, planning, code reviews and creating corresponding artifacts.', 'Create control systems and signal processing architecture including algorithms to drive the sensors on the device.', 'Develop and maintain manual/automated verification suites and build environment (git, scripts, Linux).', '6+ years of production experience with design and development of firmware in C/C++ on Linux, Windows, and RTOS real time operating systems targeting an ARM processor environment.', 'Experience in analyzing system requirements and deriving firmware requirements and creating a firmware architecture that meets the needs.', ' Create new and maintain existing analytics and firmware for innovative medical-grade upper arm wearable in a distributed and cross-functional team. Create and maintain software lifecycle documents Create control systems and signal processing architecture including algorithms to drive the sensors on the device. Develop higher-level functions, including data science algorithms and logic written in Matlab and auto-compile to C/C++ firmware. Support the verification of firmware and systems, Comply with the quality management system and applicable regulatory requirements Develop and maintain embedded software / firmware (C/C++, RTOS) in a cross-platform development environment for controlling analytical instrumentation and medical devices, using high-speed communication channels, real time data acquisition and digital/analog IOs Follow the full design life cycle process including participation in requirements specification, design activities, planning, code reviews and creating corresponding artifacts. Develop and maintain manual/automated verification suites and build environment (git, scripts, Linux). Establish and execute verification plans against units, subsystems and systems in simulated, emulated and laboratory environment. Collaborate in a cross-functional development team. ', 'Proven experience in working successfully in full SDLC, Agile Methodologies (Scrum).', "Biofourmis' technology is applicable to a multitude of different therapeutics areas. We are building out a dramatically expanded of solutions to address heart failure, oncology, and infectious diseases. Our solutions are based on an innovative wearable device that measures a wide range of biomarkers - common ones such as Heart Rate and Respiratory Rates, as well as novel ones such as Pulse Transit Times. Our device is capable of continuous monitoring and communicates over a variety of protocols including LTE, Bluetooth, and WiFi. The Sr. Analytics Engineer will report to the VP of Platforms and take ownership of all analytics aspects of the firmware and collaborate with other firmware engineers that work the communications pieces.", 'Requirements:', 'Experience developing in an IEC 62304-compliant environment is a major plus.', ' PhD/MSEE/BSEE or PhD/MSCS/BSCS or related 4-year degree and field. 6+ years of production experience with design and development of firmware in C/C++ on Linux, Windows, and RTOS real time operating systems targeting an ARM processor environment. 6+ years of production experience and formal training in signal processing and machine learning. Experience in analyzing system requirements and deriving firmware requirements and creating a firmware architecture that meets the needs. Experience with development tools such as signal generators, oscilloscopes, debuggers, emulators, simulators. Proficiency in testing and troubleshooting mixed signal electronics. Version control tools: Git, Jira, Confluence Proven experience in working successfully in full SDLC, Agile Methodologies (Scrum). Experience developing in an IEC 62304-compliant environment is a major plus.', 'Create new and maintain existing analytics and firmware for innovative medical-grade upper arm wearable in a distributed and cross-functional team. job_text: ['', ' Performing routine engineering design evaluations, analyses and product life cycle assessments with specific guidance; ', 'Our Minimum Requirements', ' PL/M-86, ASM86, C/C++ and/or closely related technologies. job_text: ['About The Team', '', 'What We’re Looking For', 'Having a bias for fixing problems with technology rather than process', 'Being someone who wakes up every morning and asks, are my systems going to be reliable today? Someone with experience developing automation or is a power user of one or more of the above-mentioned data storage technologies.', 'Never accepting the status quo, we need engineers who can see beyond what we have towards what we can build and understand how to get from here to there.', 'Demonstrating pragmatic decision making and problem-solving abilities.', ' Being someone who wakes up every morning and asks, are my systems going to be reliable today? Someone with experience developing automation or is a power user of one or more of the above-mentioned data storage technologies. Having a bias for fixing problems with technology rather than process Never accepting the status quo, we need engineers who can see beyond what we have towards what we can build and understand how to get from here to there. Being someone who has shown that they can solve complicated technical problems and analyze tradeoffs with empathy for the developers, yet building creative solutions. Demonstrating pragmatic decision making and problem-solving abilities. ', 'Bonus Points For', 'Being someone who has shown that they can solve complicated technical problems and analyze tradeoffs with empathy for the developers, yet building creative solutions.', "Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as the 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day."]

['', 'Experienced Analyst / Engineer with data centric experience. Must have experience asking effective questions, probing for important details and translating into actionable recommendations. The Engineer must have a deep understanding of Data Management software and tools in both operational and analytical solutions, the architecture needed to support these solutions, as well as experience in Data Management consulting methods and tools.', 'o Unix Shell Scripts', 'Required Skills', '• At least 10 years of experience in data warehouse architecture, data modeling, ETL Mapping, data flows, data analysis using NoSQL concepts', 'o Java', 'o SQL & NoSQL', '• Demonstrated delivery of results on past projects leveraging various analytics, data integration and management technologies involving both operational and analytical applications', 'o Teradata', 'o Oracle', 'Experience with AWS SageMaker', 'o Python', 'The Data Innovation Team rapidly builds and tests new, cutting-edge data architectures to enable Data Science and Innovation initiatives across the enterprise. Specifically, the Team is responsible for developing and delivering a Data Innovation Environment that will provision data in new and innovative ways. This includes working with the Data Science and Innovation Teams to better understand their data requirements, identifying the right sources for the data, and then rapidly providing the data that will power both the Data Science models and Innovation initiatives.', '• Ability to gather data from various systems using database languages and/or programming languages (such as but not limited to)', '• Demonstrated expertise in working with several databases (such as but not limited to)', 'o Ab Initio', 'o SQL server', '• Strong communication skills with consumers at various levels. Able to present complex and technical information clearly in business language.']
