['Responsible for a 24x7 on-call rotation to support immediate response to critical system issues', 'Qualifications', 'The systems that the Global Cloud Operations team support are critical to the ongoing success of BluJay Solutions, so we are committed to hiring the best and providing them the tools and knowledge to succeed. Although we embrace a relaxed work environment combined you’ll need to be willing to ask questions, ready to learn (and to teach), and driven to succeed. You’ll also need to be comfortable working on high profile, mission-critical projects that have the direct attention of executive leadership.', 'Leverage both new and existing technologies to automate deployment and configuration', 'Experience with VMWare administration', 'Experience with configuration management systems and concepts (Terraform, Chef etc.)', 'Experience with SAN storage technologies (Nimble, NetApp, and IBM)', 'Experience with Shell scripting or other scripting or programming language (Python, Perl, Ruby, PHP, c, Java, TCL, …)', 'Mentor members of the Linux Systems Administration Team', 'Strong problem-solving skills', 'Design, build, deploy, maintain, monitor, tune, and upgrade the Linux based infrastructure used to support development, test, and production systems without downtimeLeverage both new and existing technologies to automate deployment and configurationProvide technical leadership and guidance for multiple assignments/projects simultaneouslyMaintain personal accountability for getting things done on time and with quality resultsDevelop solid relationships with global Support, Operations, QA, and Development teamsMaintain awareness of current technologies and trends and assimilate new technology into the company work environmentWork as part of cross-functional teams to create, maintain, and implement policy, process and best practiceServe as an emergency escalation point for critical system and application failureResponsible for a 24x7 on-call rotation to support immediate response to critical system issues', 'Key Accountabilities', 'Occasional international travel required', 'BluJay Solutions Linux Engineer is responsible for designing and implementing the infrastructure that powers our web-based applications for the supply chain industry.\xa0Our Systems Admins work with both co-located and public cloud data centers. Our applications utilize a variety of open source and commercial middleware and platform applications, and our internal infrastructure leverages a similar variety of configuration and orchestration tools. This means our System Admins learn and apply skills for a variety of different architectures and designs.\xa0We utilize a number of industry leading technologies including Cisco UCS, VMWare, NetApp, Nimble, and Oracle to support BluJay applications.', '5-7 years Designing and Architecting enterprise system landscapes', 'Design, build, deploy, maintain, monitor, tune, and upgrade the Linux based infrastructure used to support development, test, and production systems without downtime', 'Experience with Public and Private cloud platforms', 'Zenoss, Zabbix, OpsGenie, or other enterprise monitoring system', 'Position Qualification Summary', '\xa0', 'Experience supporting Java-based applications, including JVM tuning, in a production environment', 'Serve as an emergency escalation point for critical system and application failure', 'BluJay Solutions delivers supply chain software and services to the world’s most progressive retailers, distributors, freight forwarders, manufacturers, and logistics service providers. Transforming supply chain logistics with the BluJay Global Trade Network, we enable customers to unlock the power of more than 40,000 universally connected partners.', 'Develop solid relationships with global Support, Operations, QA, and Development teams', 'BS or BA in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related fieldAdvanced CentOS / RedHat / Oracle Linux AdministrationStrong problem-solving skills5-7 years Designing and Architecting enterprise system landscapesExperience with Public and Private cloud platformsExperience with VMWare administrationExperience with SAN storage technologies (Nimble, NetApp, and IBM)Mentor members of the Linux Systems Administration TeamExperience with configuration management systems and concepts (Terraform, Chef etc.)Experience with Shell scripting or other scripting or programming language (Python, Perl, Ruby, PHP, c, Java, TCL, …)Experience supporting Java-based applications, including JVM tuning, in a production environmentZenoss, Zabbix, OpsGenie, or other enterprise monitoring systemOccasional international travel required', 'Maintain awareness of current technologies and trends and assimilate new technology into the company work environment', 'Provide technical leadership and guidance for multiple assignments/projects simultaneously', 'Maintain personal accountability for getting things done on time and with quality results', 'Work as part of cross-functional teams to create, maintain, and implement policy, process and best practice', 'BS or BA in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field', 'Advanced CentOS / RedHat / Oracle Linux Administration']

', ' ', 'Experienced developing with Java, Gradle, Spring and/or Guice, and n-tier web app design patterns ', 'Some Challenges You’ll Tackle', '\xa0 ', 'Here at Grubhub we’ve been dedicated to giving diners the most convenient way to order food from their favorite restaurants (whether that’s a late night Chalupa from Taco Bell or a salad for lunch from a local restaurant the day after they enjoyed said late night Chalupa).While we are food-obsessed, we are also customer-obsessed. We take great pride in knowing that we are a part of 22.6 million diners food ordering experience and we feature over 300,000 restaurants in 3,200 US cities across our suite of apps (Grubhub, LevelUp, Seamless, Tapingo, AllMenus and MenuPages). ', 'You Should Have', 'Experience developing thoroughly tested code ', '5+ years experience building highly-scalable consumer-facing applications (e-commerce preferred) ', 'Grubhub is seeking an experienced software engineer to join our dynamic Corporate Initiative team. Our work is growing the business into new areas of opportunity, spearheading service creation, and expansion across all the core areas of the platform. Day-to-day activities involve coding against stories in a sprint, verifying tests, and getting peer reviews prior to having the code accepted. The work will be distributed across many of the platform systems within Grubhub, to bring holistic technology releases to support large expansions in the business offerings. As a Continuous Delivery organization, releases to production are frequent, avoiding classic challenges of meeting/discussion/planning fatigue and roll-back difficulties that comes with heavy, infrequent production releases. ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Science, Programming, or Engineering-related field ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Science, Programming, or Engineering-related field 5+ years experience building highly-scalable consumer-facing applications (e-commerce preferred) Experience developing thoroughly tested code Experience mentoring/coaching engineers and coordinating with developers from other teams or 3rd party vendors. Be a leader within your team and the organization. ', 'Knowledge of or experience with developing distributed systems ', 'Familiarity with AWS EC2, SNS, SQS ', 'We deliver favorites every day. job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', ' Knowledge of using Splunk or Splunk integration.  Experience with SaaS product development (AWS/Azure/GCP). Experience with CI/CD and project management tools (e.g., Gitlab, Github, CI/CD pipelines, Jira, Confluence, etc.).  Go-getter, strong analytical, and problem-solving skills.  Good at multitasking, self-directed, high agility, and flexibility.  Good collaborative, documentation, and presentation skills. ', ' Breadth and depth. You want to work in an area that spans backend and frontend? We have that. Do you want to go deep into optimizing how we gather data from disparate sources? We have that too, and more. ', 'Requirements', ' Learn our product architecture, design, and partner with senior engineers on implementing new features. ', ' Familiarity with security and networking concepts. ', ' A stable, collaborative, and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen, and sit down for a quick sync every morning. ', 'What You’ll Do', ' Experience with CI/CD and project management tools (e.g., Gitlab, Github, CI/CD pipelines, Jira, Confluence, etc.). ', ' Experience working on open-source or development-in-the-open projects. ', ' Go-getter, strong analytical, and problem-solving skills. ', ' Experience with Docker, container technologies. ', ' Knowledge of web development (e.g. HTML5/CSS, Javascript, Node.js, React.js). ', ' Learn our product architecture, design, and partner with senior engineers on implementing new features. Drive root cause analysis investigations and post mortems for defects and regressions.  Collaborate with different Engineering and Product Management groups in the product requirement, solve problems and achieve the best quality ', ' Dedication to best practices in software development, including modern CI, optimizing task/build execution times, making engineering process efficient. ', ' Experience with virtualization and/or clustering systems. ', ' A constant stream of new things to learn. We’re always expanding into new areas, bringing in open source projects and contributing back, and exploring new technologies.  A set of incredibly talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support.  Breadth and depth. You want to work in an area that spans backend and frontend? We have that. Do you want to go deep into optimizing how we gather data from disparate sources? We have that too, and more.  Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation.  A stable, collaborative, and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen, and sit down for a quick sync every morning.  We don’t expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible for their time and commitment and believe that balance helps cultivate a great environment. ', ' We don’t expect people to work 12 hour days. job_text: ['A thorough knowledge of numerical methods for transistor-level circuit simulation, and understanding the custom IC design and verification practices is a plus. ', 'Knowledge on general EDA algorithm or analog circuit design is a plus. ', 'Our ideal candidate must be proficient in C/C++ Unix development. ', 'Our ideal candidate must be proficient in C/C++ Unix development. A thorough knowledge of numerical methods for transistor-level circuit simulation, and understanding the custom IC design and verification practices is a plus. Knowledge on general EDA algorithm or analog circuit design is a plus. Candidates must have a proven ability to learn from and work with an engineering and cross-functional team to deliver innovative technologies in a production environment. Experience in circuit simulation and EDA would be a plus. Required education for this role is a MS in CS/EE or related degree. ', '***New and recent grads are encouraged to apply!***', 'Experience in circuit simulation and EDA would be a plus. ', 'Candidates must have a proven ability to learn from and work with an engineering and cross-functional team to deliver innovative technologies in a production environment. ', 'Required education for this role is a MS in CS/EE or related degree. ', 'We are looking for a talented engineer for our circuit simulation suite Spectre-XPS (Fastspice) Product line. You will work on several possible R&D projects (Fastspice event-driven algorithms, circuit partitioning, graph traversal, matrix solver, parallel computing, memory/cpu optimization) and be responsible for advancing and creating state-of-the-art circuit simulation technologies and solutions. ', ' ']

['Desired Qualifications (not all are expected): ', '\u200b ', '\xa0 ', 'All candidates must be either a U.S. Citizen or Permanent Resident (Green Card holder) due to U.S. export control regulations.', 'Bachelor’s degree or technical diploma in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering or a relevant field High level of proficiency with C/C++ and MATLAB in a Linux environment (e.g. using ROS or ROS2) as well as embedded real-time operating systems (e.g. RTOS). Strong fundamentals in software architecture, interface design, and testing patterns Understanding of GPS, GNSS, or other forms of navigation / localization Familiarity with orbital mechanics, estimation theory, Kalman Filtering ', 'Xona is looking for a Software Engineer to join our Navigation Systems team. Here, you’ll be responsible for designing and developing state-of-the-art software for a new generation of satellite navigation systems. You’ll work hand-in-hand with domain experts to implement and deploy novel algorithms and schema for precision navigation and state estimation on test and flight hardware. As we progress towards the first launch you’ll support system integration, debugging, and hardware in the loop testing with the flight hardware to get your hard work into space! ', 'Strong fundamentals in software architecture, interface design, and testing patterns ', 'Understanding of GPS, GNSS, or other forms of navigation / localization ', 'Bachelor’s degree or technical diploma in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering or a relevant field ', 'Familiarity with orbital mechanics, estimation theory, Kalman Filtering ', 'Required Qualifications ', 'High level of proficiency with C/C++ and MATLAB in a Linux environment (e.g. using ROS or ROS2) as well as embedded real-time operating systems (e.g. RTOS). job_title: Strategic Cloud Engineer, Global Public Sector, Google Cloud
job_text: ['', 'Experience implementing data services, including storage, integration, and APIs.', 'Responsibilities', ' Work with customers to design Cloud based technical architectures, migration approaches, and application optimizations that enable mission objectives. Be a technical advisor and perform troubleshooting to resolve technical challenges for customers. Create and deliver best practices recommendations, tutorials, blog articles, and sample code. Travel 20-30% of the time as required. ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. ", 'Work with customers to design Cloud based technical architectures, migration approaches, and application optimizations that enable mission objectives.', 'Experience automating infrastructure provisioning, DevOps, and/or continuous integration/delivery.', ' Experience automating infrastructure provisioning, DevOps, and/or continuous integration/delivery. Experience working with and developing data management systems (NoSQL, OLTP, OLAP) and processing frameworks, including technical architectures, infrastructure components, reporting/analytics environments, API endpoints. Knowledge of containerization and container orchestration technologies like Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), Cloud Run, and Anthos or other Hybrid Cloud technologies Working knowledge of common open source server side infrastructure such as Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos, MySQL, Cassandra, Hadoop/Spark, NGINX, RabbitMQ, Jenkins, TeamCity, OpenAPI/Swagger, etc. Familiarity with standard IT security practices like identity and access management, data protection, encryption, certificate and key management. ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'About The Job', 'Experience working with and developing data management systems (NoSQL, OLTP, OLAP) and processing frameworks, including technical architectures, infrastructure components, reporting/analytics environments, API endpoints.', 'Knowledge of containerization and container orchestration technologies like Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), Cloud Run, and Anthos or other Hybrid Cloud technologies', 'Travel 20-30% of the time as required.', 'Be a technical advisor and perform troubleshooting to resolve technical challenges for customers.', 'Working knowledge of common open source server side infrastructure such as Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos, MySQL, Cassandra, Hadoop/Spark, NGINX, RabbitMQ, Jenkins, TeamCity, OpenAPI/Swagger, etc.', 'Reston, VA, USA; Atlanta, GA, USA; Austin, TX, USA; Boulder, CO, USA; New York, NY, USA; Washington, DC, USA', 'Create and deliver best practices recommendations, tutorials, blog articles, and sample code.', '4 years of experience designing, building, and deploying scalable cloud-based solution architectures.', 'Experience in writing software in one or more languages, such as Java, Python, Go, JavaScript, C++ or similar. ', 'Familiarity with standard IT security practices like identity and access management, data protection, encryption, certificate and key management.', 'Preferred Qualifications', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.  4 years of experience designing, building, and deploying scalable cloud-based solution architectures. Experience in writing software in one or more languages, such as Java, Python, Go, JavaScript, C++ or similar.  Experience implementing data services, including storage, integration, and APIs. "]

job_text: ['', 'The Data Engineer', ' 3+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets', " 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and building ETL pipelines Experience in SQL Bachelor's degree or higher in a quantitative/technical field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering) 3+ years of relevant experience in one of the following areas: Data engineering, database engineering, business intelligence or business analytics 3+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets Demonstrable experience in scripting languages (Python, Perl, Ruby) and Excel Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousing Experience with massively parallel processing (MPP) databases (data warehouse and data lake) Experience with Tableau, Matillion, and AWS services (Redshift, S3, AWS Glue, EMR, DynamoDB) Experience with cloud data platforms and big data solutions Knowledge of distributed systems as it pertains to data storage and computing", ' Has knowledge of recent advances in distributed systems (e.g. MapReduce, MPP architectures, and NoSQL databases). Can make enhancements that improve data processes (e.g., data auditing solutions, management of manually maintained tables, automating, ad-hoc or manual operation steps). Works with engineers to develop efficient data querying and modeling infrastructure. Understands how to make appropriate data trade-offs. Can balance customer requirements with technology requirements. Knows when to re-use code. Is judicious about introducing dependencies. Writing code that a Data Engineer or Software Development Engineer unfamiliar with the system can understand. Can create coherent Logical Data Models that drive physical design. Delivers pragmatic solutions. You do things with the proper level of complexity the first time (or at least minimize incidental complexity). Understands how to be efficient with resource usage (e.g., system hardware, data storage, query optimization, AWS infrastructure etc.) Collaboration with colleagues from multidisciplinary science, engineering and business backgrounds. ['', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Education and Previous Positions:', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'About Us:', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)']

job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Proven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3', 'Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', ' Amazon Aurora ', 'Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.']

["Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.", 'Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.', 'Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.', 'Open to United States and United Kingdom based candidates, remote', 'Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.', 'SailPoint is looking for an experienced marketing analytics professional to deliver data driven, actionable insights that helps optimize our marketing performance. As a Marketing Analytics Engineer, you will use your analytical abilities to provide actionable, data-driven recommendations to shape our marketing activities across multiple regions and channels globally. Your solutions will influence international decisions and create new opportunities to drive growth. On the technical side, you will be working with a wide variety of technologies (e.g. Tableau, SQL, Python), data sets, and techniques to get to actionable insights.\xa0', 'Experience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using Python', 'Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.', "Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.", 'Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.', 'Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.', 'Required Skills and Qualifications', 'As the fastest-growing, independent identity and access management (IAM) provider, SailPoint helps hundreds of global organizations securely and effectively deliver and manage user access from any device to data and applications residing in the data center, on mobile devices, and in the cloud.', 'Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for Tableau', 'Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.', 'Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.', '**This opportunity is open to remote and/or relocation. Please reach out to jobs@sailpoint.com for additional details.**', 'Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.', 'Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.', 'Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.', 'Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.', 'You will partner with marketing program managers and various functional teams to deliver analytically derived insights and then actively implement solutions to improve our Targeting and Engagement metrics. Above and beyond strong data and technical skills, the right candidate for this position will have a strong understanding of business and marketing performance and how various tools , technologies and datasets can be combined to help a B2B organization achieve growth targets.', 'Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.', 'Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.', 'More specifically, your day to day would include activities like:\xa0', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for TableauExperience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using PythonStrong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.', 'Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.', 'At SailPoint, we do things differently. We understand that a fun-loving work environment can be highly motivating and productive. When smart people work on intriguing problems, and they enjoy coming to work each day, they accomplish great things together.\xa0 With that philosophy, we’ve assembled the best identity team in the world that is passionate about the power of identity.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with it', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'As part of being a frontend engineer, you will work closely with product designers and implementation teammates to work on intuitive interfaces for our users.\xa0The challenges on the frontend are beyond the basic; we are dealing with rendering thousands of points on maps, organizing data on a network graph, implementing intricate and interactive data visualizations, and more. Our frontend stack leverages React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js.\xa0', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with itStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'About You:', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across the frontend.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code basesShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'The Frontend Software Engineer Role:', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'The Full Stack Software Engineer Role:', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'As a full stack engineer you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will own projects from pixels to database queries. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on a backend foundation of Python, Django, Celery, and Airflow, a frontend built in React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js, data stores including PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, and Neo4J, with AWS, Terraform, and Ansible underlying our infrastructure.', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About You:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users']

['Experience in Data Modeling roles, and leading the analysis and generation of technical requirements and design.', 'Optimize and update logical and physical data models to support new and existing projects and ensure business users are working in a clean safe data environment.', 'Assist in the creation of best practices for standard naming conventions and coding practices to ensure consistency of data models.', 'Coordinate activities with the rest of the data warehouse team including developers and testers; Assist in promoting database objects from lower to higher environments.', 'Recommend opportunities for reuse of data models in new projects.', 'Cloud-Native experience in AWS (Glue, S3, Redshift)', ' Experience in Data Modeling roles, and leading the analysis and generation of technical requirements and design. Reverse and forward engineer data models in an AWS -heavy environment. Optimize and update logical and physical data models to support new and existing projects and ensure business users are working in a clean safe data environment. Assist in the creation of best practices for standard naming conventions and coding practices to ensure consistency of data models. Document database processes that currently extract the data from the existing system for reporting purposes. Define and document the technical architecture of the data warehouse, including the physical components and their functionality, data models and data dictionaries. Coordinate activities with the rest of the data warehouse team including developers and testers; Assist in promoting database objects from lower to higher environments. Lead design reviews of data models and other relevant metadata to ensure consistency, quality, accuracy and integrity. Recommend opportunities for reuse of data models in new projects. Consult with ETL developers, report developers, end users concerning how to use the database as designed and how to navigate efficiently within the database. Guide System Analysts, Engineers, Programmers and others on project limitations and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces, and system integration challenges and solutions. ', 'Develop and maintain logical and physical data models using best practices and company standards to ensure high data quality, reduced data redundancy, and good query performance.', 'Consult with ETL developers, report developers, end users concerning how to use the database as designed and how to navigate efficiently within the database.', 'Define and document the technical architecture of the data warehouse, including the physical components and their functionality, data models and data dictionaries.']

job_text: ['', ' 4+ years experience of software testing.  Strong testing background with rich experience in creating test plans, designing test cases, test execution, defect tracking and reporting. Experience with Web automation and/or mobile testing.  Must be customer focused and work effectively with cross functional teams. Demonstrated experience in test framework design and development.  Experience working in an Agile environment.  Excellent analytical and problem solving skills with a keen attention to detail.  Ability to triage issues and work with cross functional teams. ', ' Experience with Web automation and/or mobile testing. ['', 'Expert level SQL (7+ years experience)Experience in database technologies (Postgres,RedShift etc.) (7+ years experience)Programming language experience (Python, Java, etc) (1+ years experience)Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical usersAbility to function in a fast paced, constantly changing environmentExcellent written and verbal communication skillsPM skills such as planning, prioritization, requirements gathering and communication across teamsWorking knowledge of data modeling and data quality techniquesExperience working with GIT/Docker/Jenkins is a plusAWS experience is a plus', 'Expert level SQL (7+ years experience)', 'Ability to function in a fast paced, constantly changing environment', 'Redfin is combining technology and customer service to reinvent the end to end experience for buying and selling a home in the consumer’s favor. The opportunity is huge, with $60 billion spent every year on real estate commissions and the industry is ripe for change.\xa0 So far, we’ve helped over 80,000 people buy and sell homes, saving them over $200M in fees, and doing it all with a high customer satisfaction score.', 'Job Requirements', 'AWS experience is a plus', 'Develop and maintain complex SQL that executes hundreds of custom business rules and outputs agent compensation data', 'Develop and unit test assigned features to meet product requirements', 'Ensure 100% accuracy in everything you do - make sure that all code and processes are fully tested and verified before running in production', 'Experience in database technologies (Postgres,RedShift etc.) (7+ years experience)', 'Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical users', 'Programming language experience (Python, Java, etc) (1+ years experience)', 'Create a new architecture around agent compensation that will allow for configurable business rules and will scale to meet our growing employee base', 'Work with a cross-department team to review, define and implement the Redfin Agent Compensation SystemDevelop and maintain complex SQL that executes hundreds of custom business rules and outputs agent compensation dataEnsure 100% accuracy in everything you do - make sure that all code and processes are fully tested and verified before running in productionDevelop, implement and tune ETL processes to support downstream applicationsCreate code that meets design specifications, follows standards and is easy to maintainDevelop and unit test assigned features to meet product requirementsCreate a new architecture around agent compensation that will allow for configurable business rules and will scale to meet our growing employee base', 'To make sure we hire the most qualified people, we’ve designed a multi-step selection process which may include interviews, a homework assignment, and a reference check. We’re excited to get to know you and hope you’re ready to give this opportunity everything you’ve got!', 'Job Responsibilities', 'PM skills such as planning, prioritization, requirements gathering and communication across teams', 'Develop, implement and tune ETL processes to support downstream applications', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Create code that meets design specifications, follows standards and is easy to maintain', 'Working knowledge of data modeling and data quality techniques', 'Work with a cross-department team to review, define and implement the Redfin Agent Compensation System', "As Senior Data Engineer - Agent Compensation on the Data Engineering Team, you will be part of the team that owns Redfin's data automation platform, data warehouse, and agent pay system. This role will own the Redfin Agent Compensation System from end to end.\xa0 In this role, you will work closely with Real Estate Operations, Finance, HR and Analytics to review, define and implement compensation policy. This is a highly visible and highly accountable role and will require a PM mindset along with the technical skill of a Data Engineer.", 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'Experience working with GIT/Docker/Jenkins is a plus']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Big Data - Cloud
job_text: ['', 'Rakuten Catalog Platform is an exciting project at Rakuten. Our mission is to provide an accurate, compelling catalog with millions of products covering thousands of merchant partnersÂ\xa0â€“Â\xa0andÂ\xa0build highly relevant search and other servicesÂ\xa0to take our e-commerce offering to the next level. This platform supports global business units from many countries including USA,Â Japan, UK, Germany, Canada and others.', 'This is a great opportunity to join early as Lead in the team, influence the technology selection and build/own the infrastructure.', 'Qualifications:', 'This platform uses Big Data technologies, Cloud infrastructure, open source scalable search platform and cutting edge machine learning/statistical modeling and it will be highly leveraged within the company, becoming the foundation for our next-generation of applications.', 'We are looking for hands-on Technical Lead. The position is located in San Mateo, California.', '7+ years of solid Java back-end experience', 'Bonus if you have experience for leading /managing teams/projects', 'Be part of an awesome R&D team where you get inspired by talented people, challenges and mission to change the global e-commerce landscape! ', 'Role:', 'Able to effectively communicate across teams and roles.', 'Experience with Relational databases, queries and RDBMS best practices as a consumer', 'Experience with any of these technologies a HUGE plus: Big Data (Cassandra / Hadoop), Spark, Flink, machine learning, Cloud (AWS or Google Cloud)', 'Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills', 'Rakuten, Inc. is the largest ecommerce company in Japan, and third largest ecommerce marketplace worldwide. We seek to empower merchants to deliver hospitality mindset, which helps sellers create lasting relationships with customers. Along with the global marketplaces, Rakuten supports an ever expanding list of acquisitions and strategic investments in disruptive industries and growing markets.', 'Job Description:', '7+ years of solid Java back-end experienceStrong knowledge of design patterns, OOPS principles and data structuresStrong knowledge of at least some of the following frameworks/technologies â€“, Spring, REST, XML, JSON, ActiveMQ, KafkaExperience with any of these technologies a HUGE plus: Big Data (Cassandra / Hadoop), Spark, Flink, machine learning, Cloud (AWS or Google Cloud)Bonus if you have experience for leading /managing teams/projectsExperience with tools and technologies like Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Docker to support end to end software developmentExperience with Relational databases, queries and RDBMS best practices as a consumerStrong troubleshooting and performance tuning skillsAbility to work in a fast paced Agile development and rapid deployment in the Cloud/SaaS environment.Able to effectively communicate across teams and roles.BS/MS in Computer Science or a related field', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or a related field', 'You will be responsible for leading design & development of Product Catalog & Search components including storage, search, large data processing (stream & batch), APIs, analytics, tools and web services. This platform runs in Google Cloud.', 'Strong knowledge of at least some of the following frameworks/technologies â€“, Spring, REST, XML, JSON, ActiveMQ, Kafka', 'Ability to work in a fast paced Agile development and rapid deployment in the Cloud/SaaS environment.', 'Strong knowledge of design patterns, OOPS principles and data structures', 'At Rakuten, we offer competitive salaries, benefits, annual bonuses, a stocked kitchen (including catered lunch daily), and a dynamic office environment. We love investing in our people and when it comes down to it, we think our entire team is pretty awesome. As a technology focused company, we understand the importance of an energizing atmosphere that promotes collaboration and innovation.', 'Experience with tools and technologies like Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Docker to support end to end software development']

job_text: ['', 'The candidate should have proficiency of one or more of the following languages: C/C++/C#/Java/Rust/Go, with Go (aka. golang) experience being ideal. ', 'Requirement:', 'Design APIs to exceed the businesses needs and evangelize those interfaces within the organization', 'The ideal candidate is a creative and curious motivated team player. Big three cloud (AWS, GCS, Azure), configuration management (puppet, salt, ansible, terraform), CI/CD and Kubernetes/docker experience is desirable but not required.', 'Build applications and APIs using the latest best practices and technologies', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', ' Experience with high-throughput systems/APIs, CDNs and strong understanding of HTTP and gRPC semantics is a plus. ', 'What You Will Do', 'Build applications and APIs using the latest best practices and technologiesOptimize applications for optimal performance, painless auto-scaling and efficient resource utilizationDesign APIs to exceed the businesses needs and evangelize those interfaces within the organizationEvangelize delivering software using an agile methodology, true DevOps and gitops CI/CD development practices', 'Evangelize delivering software using an agile methodology, true DevOps and gitops CI/CD development practices', 'We are seeking software developers with experience in systems software or web development.', 'Company Description', 'Optimize applications for optimal performance, painless auto-scaling and efficient resource utilization', 'We are seeking software developers with experience in systems software or web development. Experience with high-throughput systems/APIs, CDNs and strong understanding of HTTP and gRPC semantics is a plus. The candidate should have proficiency of one or more of the following languages: C/C++/C#/Java/Rust/Go, with Go (aka. golang) experience being ideal. The ideal candidate is a creative and curious motivated team player. Big three cloud (AWS, GCS, Azure), configuration management (puppet, salt, ansible, terraform), CI/CD and Kubernetes/docker experience is desirable but not required.']

['Experience with embedded software design and implementation for automotive, industrial, aerospace/military, or other safety-critical systems ', 'Xona is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer to join our Navigation Systems team. Here you’ll be responsible for leading the development of state-of-the-art software for a new generation of satellite navigation systems. You’ll work hand-in-hand with domain experts to implement and deploy novel algorithms and schema for precision navigation and state estimation on test and flight hardware. As we progress towards the first launch you’ll support system integration, debugging, and hardware in the loop testing with the flight hardware to get your hard work into space! ', 'Experience building and executing test plans to validate software for production release ', '\u200b ', '\xa0 ', 'Desired Qualifications (not all are expected) ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering or a relevant field ', 'All candidates must be either a U.S. Citizen or Permanent Resident (Green Card holder) due to U.S. export control regulations.', 'Proven success in a fast-paced, cross-functional engineering team environment ', 'Familiarity with orbital mechanics, estimation theory, Kalman Filtering ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering or a relevant field 5+ years of professional software development experience Experience with embedded software design and implementation for automotive, industrial, aerospace/military, or other safety-critical systems Proven success in a fast-paced, cross-functional engineering team environment Experience building and executing test plans to validate software for production release Understanding of GPS, GNSS, or other forms of navigation / localization Familiarity with orbital mechanics, estimation theory, Kalman Filtering ', 'Understanding of GPS, GNSS, or other forms of navigation / localization ', 'Required Qualifications ', '5+ years of professional software development experience ']

["Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.", 'Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.', 'Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.', 'Open to United States and United Kingdom based candidates, remote', 'Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.', 'SailPoint is looking for an experienced marketing analytics professional to deliver data driven, actionable insights that helps optimize our marketing performance. As a Marketing Analytics Engineer, you will use your analytical abilities to provide actionable, data-driven recommendations to shape our marketing activities across multiple regions and channels globally. Your solutions will influence international decisions and create new opportunities to drive growth. On the technical side, you will be working with a wide variety of technologies (e.g. Tableau, SQL, Python), data sets, and techniques to get to actionable insights.\xa0', 'Experience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using Python', 'Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.', "Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.", 'Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.', 'Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.', 'Required Skills and Qualifications', 'As the fastest-growing, independent identity and access management (IAM) provider, SailPoint helps hundreds of global organizations securely and effectively deliver and manage user access from any device to data and applications residing in the data center, on mobile devices, and in the cloud.', 'Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for Tableau', 'Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.', 'Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.', '**This opportunity is open to remote and/or relocation. Please reach out to jobs@sailpoint.com for additional details.**', 'Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.', 'Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.', 'Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.', 'Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.', 'You will partner with marketing program managers and various functional teams to deliver analytically derived insights and then actively implement solutions to improve our Targeting and Engagement metrics. Above and beyond strong data and technical skills, the right candidate for this position will have a strong understanding of business and marketing performance and how various tools , technologies and datasets can be combined to help a B2B organization achieve growth targets.', 'Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.', 'Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.', 'More specifically, your day to day would include activities like:\xa0', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for TableauExperience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using PythonStrong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.', 'Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.', 'At SailPoint, we do things differently. We understand that a fun-loving work environment can be highly motivating and productive. When smart people work on intriguing problems, and they enjoy coming to work each day, they accomplish great things together.\xa0 With that philosophy, we’ve assembled the best identity team in the world that is passionate about the power of identity.']
