job_title: Senior Software Engineer- Big Data Technologies
job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Proven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3', 'Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', ' Amazon Aurora ', 'Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'The Full Stack Software Engineer Role:', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'As a full stack engineer you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will own projects from pixels to database queries. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on a backend foundation of Python, Django, Celery, and Airflow, a frontend built in React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js, data stores including PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, and Neo4J, with AWS, Terraform, and Ansible underlying our infrastructure.', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About You:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users']

This Software Engineer will also have experience using new technologies on proof-of-concept projects for enterprise level companies. ', 'Experience with more than one of these databases; Oracle,      SQL Server, MySQL, Hadoop, Teradata, etc.       \xa0  ', 'Experience with more than one of these development      language; Java, C#, JavaScript, Ruby, Python, etc. ', 'Experience with ETL tools is a big plus.', 'Requirements ', '5+ years of software development experience \xa0 ', 'One of our largest clients in Charlotte, outside of the banks, is looking for a Software Engineer who has experience developing on multiple platforms using different kinds of technologies to solve complex issues. This Software Engineer will be responsible for end-to-end development for some highly visible applications that are using some of the latest and greatest technologies. ', 'Software Engineer ', ' 5+ years of software development experience \xa0  Experience with more than one of these development      language; Java, C#, JavaScript, Ruby, Python, etc.  Experience with more than one of these databases; Oracle,      SQL Server, MySQL, Hadoop, Teradata, etc.       \xa0   Experience with ETL tools is a big plus.', ' ', 'This position is going to start out as a long-term contract and the team is only looking for someone who wants to find a position for the next few years. It can offer a great compensation package along with full benefits. ']

['', 'The Home Services team is responsible for enabling Redfin to provide renovations and repairs to homes in a new way. When the team formed one year ago, it supported the RedfinNow business by estimating and tracking the renovation and repair of homes that Redfin purchased. Now, Home Services is coordinating with Redfin Concierge to help homeowners directly! We need your help to expand into this new market and create revolutionary home services by offering trustworthy, efficient, and cost-effective solutions.\xa0', 'Technologies We Use', 'Strong software architecture skills - we’re building a lot of things from scratch here.', 'Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, restricted stock grants and generous benefits.', "Respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas. When you disagree, you disagree constructively.", 'A track record of taking something from concept through to production, and maintaining it.', 'We Offer', "Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.You'll see the fruits of your labor released every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.A well-defined career ladder and management support to help grow your career.Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, restricted stock grants and generous benefits.", "5+ years of professional experience working in a similar tech stack: Java, React, Postgres, GraphQL.Strong software architecture skills - we’re building a lot of things from scratch here.A track record of taking something from concept through to production, and maintaining it.Ability to think through technical tradeoffs and justify your reasoning.Respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas. When you disagree, you disagree constructively.Effective communication and team-building skills.", 'Ability to think through technical tradeoffs and justify your reasoning.', 'A well-defined career ladder and management support to help grow your career.', "You'll see the fruits of your labor released every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.", 'Effective communication and team-building skills.', '5+ years of professional experience working in a similar tech stack: Java, React, Postgres, GraphQL.', 'Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.', 'We’re looking for an awesome full-stack developer to work on technology that’s going to revolutionize the home services industry.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Redfin is revolutionizing the $75 billion real estate industry. We use data, beautiful software, and innovative design to put customers first at every step in the home-buying and selling process. Get ready to dive headfirst into our award-winning website and mobile apps, solving complex business problems in a highly visible, customer-centric way. If you value doing impactful work in a collaborative environment, join our team!', 'What You Bring', "You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.", 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'AWS, Kubernetes, GraphQL, Java, Postgres, React (web and native), and various other tools/libraries. We are always open to adopting new tools and technologies if they’re right for the job.']

['', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Education and Previous Positions:', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'About Us:', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)']

job_title: Software Engineer - Full Stack (React, Python, Tensorflow, Docker)
job_text: ['', 'Develop products that serve our customers and consumers', 'Prototype new ideas and iterate towards the ideal user experience', 'Experienced with designing, building, launching and maintaining products', 'Qualifications and Experience', 'Passion and drive to change employment and recruiting', 'Technical Stack:\xa0', 'Collaborate with Product Management, Design, and rest of Engineering to iterate and enhance our product', 'Communicates and collaborates effectively across teams', 'Job Description', 'Cares about the details in the user experience', 'Collaborate with Product Management, Design, and rest of Engineering to iterate and enhance our productDevelop products that serve our customers and consumersLead technical discussions and plans to improve our overall software qualityPrototype new ideas and iterate towards the ideal user experience', 'Qualifications and Experience:', 'LOCAL CANDIDATES PREFERRED!', 'Lead technical discussions and plans to improve our overall software quality', 'NO THIRD PARTY VENDORS OR CONSULTANTS!', 'Recent hands-on professional experience with Tensorflow, React, Python, Docker', 'Job Description:', 'ALL CANDIDATES MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE USA AND START IMMEDIATELY (2-Week Notice TOPS!)', 'Our client is changing the way organizations think about hiring, engaging, and growing people with the power of technology & AI.', 'NO RECENT GRADS - PLEASE!', 'Fluent in full-stack development and wanting to learn new technologies', 'You’ll work with a world-class team.\xa0This is a fast-growing team of engineers, data scientists, salespeople, marketers and they are always looking for other passionate, driven and creative people to join our team.', 'Technical Stack:\xa0Tensorflow, React, Python, and Docker', 'Fluent in full-stack development and wanting to learn new technologiesRecent hands-on professional experience with Tensorflow, React, Python, DockerExperienced with designing, building, launching and maintaining productsCares about the details in the user experiencePassion and drive to change employment and recruitingCommunicates and collaborates effectively across teams']

["Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.", 'Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.', 'Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.', 'Open to United States and United Kingdom based candidates, remote', 'Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.', 'SailPoint is looking for an experienced marketing analytics professional to deliver data driven, actionable insights that helps optimize our marketing performance. As a Marketing Analytics Engineer, you will use your analytical abilities to provide actionable, data-driven recommendations to shape our marketing activities across multiple regions and channels globally. Your solutions will influence international decisions and create new opportunities to drive growth. On the technical side, you will be working with a wide variety of technologies (e.g. Tableau, SQL, Python), data sets, and techniques to get to actionable insights.\xa0', 'Experience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using Python', 'Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.', "Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.", 'Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.', 'Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.', 'Required Skills and Qualifications', 'As the fastest-growing, independent identity and access management (IAM) provider, SailPoint helps hundreds of global organizations securely and effectively deliver and manage user access from any device to data and applications residing in the data center, on mobile devices, and in the cloud.', 'Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for Tableau', 'Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.', 'Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.', '**This opportunity is open to remote and/or relocation. Please reach out to jobs@sailpoint.com for additional details.**', 'Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.', 'Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.', 'Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.', 'Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.', 'You will partner with marketing program managers and various functional teams to deliver analytically derived insights and then actively implement solutions to improve our Targeting and Engagement metrics. Above and beyond strong data and technical skills, the right candidate for this position will have a strong understanding of business and marketing performance and how various tools , technologies and datasets can be combined to help a B2B organization achieve growth targets.', 'Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.', 'Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.', 'More specifically, your day to day would include activities like:\xa0', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for TableauExperience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using PythonStrong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.', 'Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.', 'At SailPoint, we do things differently. We understand that a fun-loving work environment can be highly motivating and productive. When smart people work on intriguing problems, and they enjoy coming to work each day, they accomplish great things together.\xa0 With that philosophy, we’ve assembled the best identity team in the world that is passionate about the power of identity.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer- Big Data Technologies
job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Proven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3', 'Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', ' Amazon Aurora ', 'Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'The Full Stack Software Engineer Role:', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'As a full stack engineer you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will own projects from pixels to database queries. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on a backend foundation of Python, Django, Celery, and Airflow, a frontend built in React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js, data stores including PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, and Neo4J, with AWS, Terraform, and Ansible underlying our infrastructure.', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About You:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users']

['The Hazard Modeling Team within CBRNE Defense is seeking self-motivated people who live at the interface of software development, engineering/science, and mathematics to support the development of customer-focused software applications. job_title: Data Center Controls Engineer, Server Hall
job_text: ['', 'Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Austell, GA, USA; Council Bluffs, IA, USA; Clarksville, TN, USA; New Albany, OH, USA; Midlothian, TX, USA; The Dalles, OR 97058, USA; Lenoir, NC, USA; Moncks Corner, SC 29461, USA; Reston, VA, USA; Henderson, NV, USA; Pryor, OK 74361, USA; Bridgeport, AL 35740, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA', 'Software programming skills in C++, Java, Python, or similar in an industrial controls context. ', 'Responsibilities', ' Knowledge of server hall / data hall cooling process control dynamics and control systems integration. Knowledge of controls and process optimization for mission critical facility systems.  Knowledge of large-scale data centers’ mechanical and/or electrical infrastructure systems. Software programming skills in C++, Java, Python, or similar in an industrial controls context.  Ability to work with embedded systems and related hardware/software teams. ', 'Experience as a controls engineering lead for systems integration design, construction, and/or product development projects.', 'Develop data center monitoring and control system designs (basis of design, constructability, infrastructure expansions and retrofits) in a matrixed team environment.', 'Knowledge of large-scale data centers’ mechanical and/or electrical infrastructure systems.', 'Generate controls engineering services and materials scope of work for product development, deployment, and infrastructure upgrades and update/maintain internal design specifications, drawings and standards to the latest configurations.', " Bachelor's degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience. 10 years of experience with mission critical facilities. Experience in bidding, designing, commissioning, and operating PLC/SCADA systems from client/server. Experience as a controls engineering lead for systems integration design, construction, and/or product development projects. ", 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience in bidding, designing, commissioning, and operating PLC/SCADA systems from client/server.', 'About The Job', 'Ability to work with embedded systems and related hardware/software teams.', 'Knowledge of server hall / data hall cooling process control dynamics and control systems integration.', 'Manage all control system engineering issues during development, design, bidding, implementation, and testing. Identify and resolve issues raised by cross-functional stakeholders.', ' Develop data center monitoring and control system designs (basis of design, constructability, infrastructure expansions and retrofits) in a matrixed team environment. Design, setup, and execute control and thermal validation experiments. Manage all control system engineering issues during development, design, bidding, implementation, and testing. Identify and resolve issues raised by cross-functional stakeholders. Generate controls engineering services and materials scope of work for product development, deployment, and infrastructure upgrades and update/maintain internal design specifications, drawings and standards to the latest configurations. Collaborate across disciplines and functions (thermal, mechanical, electrical, software, networking, project management, operations) understand interrelated issues, and handle vendor partnering and successful internal/external product delivery per design and hardware standards. ['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with it', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'As part of being a frontend engineer, you will work closely with product designers and implementation teammates to work on intuitive interfaces for our users.\xa0The challenges on the frontend are beyond the basic; we are dealing with rendering thousands of points on maps, organizing data on a network graph, implementing intricate and interactive data visualizations, and more. Our frontend stack leverages React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js.\xa0', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with itStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'About You:', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across the frontend.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code basesShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'The Frontend Software Engineer Role:', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.']

["Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.", 'Pulling together unstructured and structured datasets across the organization and creating actionable insights on tight deadlines.', 'Actively manage the various target account segments in Salesforce and their connections into our various marketing systems.', 'Open to United States and United Kingdom based candidates, remote', 'Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.', 'SailPoint is looking for an experienced marketing analytics professional to deliver data driven, actionable insights that helps optimize our marketing performance. As a Marketing Analytics Engineer, you will use your analytical abilities to provide actionable, data-driven recommendations to shape our marketing activities across multiple regions and channels globally. Your solutions will influence international decisions and create new opportunities to drive growth. On the technical side, you will be working with a wide variety of technologies (e.g. Tableau, SQL, Python), data sets, and techniques to get to actionable insights.\xa0', 'Experience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using Python', 'Working with our Technology Vendors to understand what moves the needle and how we can improve\xa0scalability and improve our core metrics.', "Sourcing NEW datasets: Exporting from 3rd party tools; connecting to API's; building new features from existing data and combining it all to improve our overall campaign performance and advise on Next Best Actions.", 'Responding to requests for analysis that will help uncover opportunities for improvement.', 'Work with the Content Team to identify the best organic opportunities by region based on search intent data.', 'Required Skills and Qualifications', 'As the fastest-growing, independent identity and access management (IAM) provider, SailPoint helps hundreds of global organizations securely and effectively deliver and manage user access from any device to data and applications residing in the data center, on mobile devices, and in the cloud.', 'Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for Tableau', 'Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.', 'Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.', '**This opportunity is open to remote and/or relocation. Please reach out to jobs@sailpoint.com for additional details.**', 'Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.', 'Work with the paid media team to identify opportunities to scale our paid media effectiveness.', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.', 'Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.', 'Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.', 'You will partner with marketing program managers and various functional teams to deliver analytically derived insights and then actively implement solutions to improve our Targeting and Engagement metrics. Above and beyond strong data and technical skills, the right candidate for this position will have a strong understanding of business and marketing performance and how various tools , technologies and datasets can be combined to help a B2B organization achieve growth targets.', 'Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.', 'Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.', 'More specifically, your day to day would include activities like:\xa0', 'Experience in data analysis ideally within a business to business industry. Experience in international markets and/or fast-growing companies particularly valued.Completed a bachelor’s degree, Marketing, Business Administration, or to have obtained any other equivalent certification. A degree in Mathematics, Statistics a plus. Additional credentials and courses in Marketing Analytics are definite assets.Exceptional analytic skills coupled with solid business thinking.Very strong SQL skills, able to handle complex data structures from multiple sources (Big Data, conventional DBs and NoSQL data sources ) and different areas like digital, transactional, marketing, CRM, sales pipeline analysis.Experience with SEM, SEO and Social (Facebook / LinkedIn) strongly preferred.Working knowledge of marketing operations, ad tech, media planning, and media performance metrics.Experience utilizing marketing measurement methods, including A/B testing, multi-touch attribution, and media mix modeling.Experience building dashboards or self-serve tools, with preference for TableauExperience using statistical methods to create models and analyse large datasets using PythonStrong communication skills with the ability to explain complex analytical work to audiences with varying technical knowledge.Self-directed, innovative thinker. In addition to a strong attention to detail, strong candidates will also be able to see the strategic implications for the business in the big picture.Strong candidates will have a curious mind, a passion for synthesizing information from multiple sources, the ability to interpret data through the lens of Enterprise SaaS, and a habit of translating data into insights that drive action.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.', 'Meeting with team members from across the sales and marketing organization and guiding them through the data that is relevant to their territory or functional area.', 'At SailPoint, we do things differently. We understand that a fun-loving work environment can be highly motivating and productive. When smart people work on intriguing problems, and they enjoy coming to work each day, they accomplish great things together.\xa0 With that philosophy, we’ve assembled the best identity team in the world that is passionate about the power of identity.']

['', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Our Team:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'About Us:', 'What We Look For:', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About You:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users']

job_text: ['', 'Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.', 'Title', ' Swagger ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', '2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environmentStrong background in complex queries to support data analyticsExperience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processingProven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'Experience in performance tuning, scalability design, and Spark data processing', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.2+ years of hands-on experience with Big Data technologies with data stores such as DynamoDB, Cassandra and related tools and systems.Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.Strong background in Scala, relational databases, and complex systems integration.Bachelors or Graduate Degree in Computer Science or a related engineering field.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Proven experience with AWS services such as CloudFormation, CloudWatch, SNS, IAM, VPC, ELB, EC2, S3', 'Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.Experience in relational database technologies such as  Amazon Aurora .Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Engages in building solutions leveraging technologies including but not limited to Python, .NET, Scala, Spark, Hive and AWS services such as EC2, S3, ECS, Lambda, EMR, ELB, Kinesis, SNS.', 'Deep technical understanding of Spark, and Hive.', 'Overview Of Position', 'Minimum of 8 years in the IT industry with a focus on the development of complex business systems.', 'Experience building and supporting complex systems in AWS Cloud environment', '3+ years of hands-on experience with API technologies and systems.', 'Strong background in complex queries to support data analytics', 'Develop or enhance software components and products that focus on determining if data, from multiple sources, should belong to the same individual. This may involve the development or utilization of deterministic and/or probabilistic matching algorithms or tools.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Knowledge of JIRA, GitLab and Octopus Deploy highly preferred and knowledge in API documenters such as  Swagger , and RAML.', ' Amazon Aurora ', 'Design, modify, implement, test, and provide operational support for enterprise software products and platforms, including software infrastructure and development tools for the Data.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Strong knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), test-driven development, and unit test automation', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.']
